title: Bakkt‚Äôs Bold Bitcoin Move: Unveiling bitcoin.jp for Strategic Expansion in Japan
body: BitcoinWorld Bakkt‚Äôs Bold Bitcoin Move: Unveiling bitcoin.jp for Strategic Expansion in Japan Get ready for a significant shift in the digital asset landscape! Bakkt Holdings (BKKT), a prominent name in the cryptocurrency space, is making a strategic move that could reshape its future and accelerate crypto expansion in Japan . This development marks a pivotal moment, signaling Bakkt‚Äôs deeper commitment to a Bitcoin-centric approach. Understanding the Bakkt Acquisition and Rebranding Bakkt is set to acquire a 30% stake in Japan‚Äôs Marusho Hotta (MHT). This isn‚Äôt just any investment; it‚Äôs a calculated step. The stake is being purchased from RIZAP Group, a well-known Japanese conglomerate. But the big news doesn‚Äôt stop there. Following this Bakkt acquisition , Marusho Hotta will undergo a complete rebrand. Pending crucial shareholder approval, the company will soon be known as ‚Äúbitcoin.jp‚Äù. This new name clearly highlights the strategic direction and the focus on the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency. Why is this happening now? The move aligns perfectly with Bakkt‚Äôs recently articulated shift towards a robust Bitcoin strategy . This strategy emphasizes holding Bitcoin as a core treasury asset, a trend gaining traction among forward-thinking corporations. The Block, a respected industry publication, initially reported these exciting details. What Powers Bakkt‚Äôs New Bitcoin Strategy? Such ambitious plans require significant financial backing. Bakkt has been busy securing the necessary capital to fuel its new direction. The company recently completed a successful $75 million equity raise, providing a substantial cash injection. This funding is critical for executing its strategic initiatives, including the Marusho Hotta acquisition. Furthermore, Bakkt has filed a $1 billion shelf registration. This financial maneuver gives the company flexibility to raise additional capital in the future, if and when needed. It demonstrates a long-term vision and commitment to its Bitcoin strategy , ensuring resources are available for future growth and expansion. This financial readiness is key to understanding the scope of Bakkt‚Äôs ambition. They are not just dabbling in Bitcoin; they are building a fundamental part of their corporate treasury around it, aiming for sustained growth and innovation within the digital asset innovation sector. The Significance of the bitcoin.jp Launch in Japan The rebranding of Marusho Hotta to ‚Äúbitcoin.jp‚Äù is more than just a name change. It represents a direct entry point into the Japanese market for Bakkt with a clear Bitcoin focus. Japan has a unique and often strict regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies, making this a noteworthy development. The establishment of bitcoin.jp launch could pave the way for: Increased Bitcoin Adoption: A locally branded entity could make Bitcoin more accessible and trustworthy for Japanese consumers and businesses. New Product Offerings: Bakkt might leverage bitcoin.jp to introduce a range of Bitcoin-centric products and services tailored for the Japanese market. Regulatory Clarity: Operating through a locally acquired and rebranded entity could streamline regulatory compliance and foster trust with Japanese authorities. This move is a strong indicator of Bakkt‚Äôs confidence in the global future of Bitcoin and its intent to play a significant role in crypto expansion Japan , a key economic hub in Asia. What Does This Mean for Digital Asset Innovation? Bakkt‚Äôs strategic decisions are often watched closely by the broader industry. Their shift towards a Bitcoin treasury strategy, supported by substantial funding, could set a precedent for other companies. It underscores the growing institutional confidence in Bitcoin as a legitimate and valuable asset class. The creation of ‚Äúbitcoin.jp‚Äù in Japan is a testament to Bakkt‚Äôs commitment to digital asset innovation on a global scale. It shows a willingness to navigate complex international markets and localize their offerings to meet specific regional demands. This strategic thinking is vital for the long-term growth and mainstream adoption of cryptocurrencies worldwide. In summary, Bakkt‚Äôs acquisition of a stake in Marusho Hotta and its subsequent rebranding to ‚Äúbitcoin.jp‚Äù is a powerful statement. It solidifies Bakkt‚Äôs pivot towards a robust Bitcoin treasury strategy, backed by significant financial resources. This move not only promises to accelerate crypto expansion in Japan but also highlights Bakkt‚Äôs leadership in driving global digital asset innovation . It‚Äôs an exciting time to watch how this bold strategy unfolds. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is the primary purpose of Bakkt‚Äôs acquisition of Marusho Hotta? The primary purpose is to establish a strong foothold in the Japanese market and align with Bakkt‚Äôs new Bitcoin treasury strategy, rebranding the acquired entity as ‚Äúbitcoin.jp‚Äù to reflect this focus. How is Bakkt funding this strategic move and its Bitcoin strategy? Bakkt is funding this move through a recent $75 million equity raise and has also filed a $1 billion shelf registration to provide future financial flexibility for its Bitcoin strategy. What does the rebranding to ‚Äúbitcoin.jp‚Äù signify? The rebranding signifies Bakkt‚Äôs dedicated focus on Bitcoin within the Japanese market, aiming to enhance Bitcoin adoption and introduce new digital asset services in the region. Will this acquisition impact Bakkt‚Äôs existing operations? While the core operations may continue, this strategic acquisition indicates a significant shift towards a Bitcoin-centric treasury and expansion into key international markets like Japan, potentially influencing future product development. How might this move affect crypto expansion in Japan? The launch of a dedicated ‚Äúbitcoin.jp‚Äù entity by a major player like Bakkt could significantly boost Bitcoin accessibility and trust among Japanese consumers and institutions, accelerating overall crypto expansion in the country. title: Berkshire Hathaway shares have dropped 14% since May 2, while the S&P 500 gained 11%
body: Berkshire Hathaway is lagging the market worse than it has in half a century, and it‚Äôs all happening as Warren Buffett steps closer to retirement. Since May 2, when Warren announced that Greg Abel would take over as CEO, class A shares have dropped 14%, which for Wall Street, that‚Äôs pretty steep. Meanwhile, the S&P 500 gained 11%, including dividends. The 25 percentage point gap is the widest underperformance in more than three decades. Warren, who is widely regarded as the greatest investor in modern history, spent nearly 60 years turning Berkshire from a failing textile company into a holding giant. But the investors who built up his reputation are starting to walk. The Monday after his retirement plan was made public, the stock dropped almost 5%. The last time Berkshire trailed this hard was during the pandemic crash when financial stocks, which still make up a large part of the company‚Äôs portfolio, took a hit. Old money exits as investors ditch value for growth Berkshire‚Äôs class A shares, the company‚Äôs original high-vote stock, were trading at a record $812,855 in May. That‚Äôs when selling began. These shares are usually held by families who got in decades ago and passed them down through generations. It‚Äôs still unknown who exactly is offloading them, but public filings from major institutions are due later this month. Despite the selloff, Berkshire‚Äôs operations aren‚Äôt bleeding. The second quarter saw profit growth in the BNSF railroad, utility businesses, manufacturing, and retail. The company‚Äôs operating earnings rose 8% from a year ago, excluding currency changes. But even with strong numbers, buyers aren‚Äôt biting. Berkshire‚Äôs stock had gained 18.9% in the months leading to its annual meeting in May. That run was driven by fears of market volatility, especially around President Donald Trump‚Äôs ongoing trade fights. Investors rushed to what they saw as a safe bet. ‚ÄúAs the worries about tariffs started to build‚Äâ.‚Äâ.‚Äâ.‚Äâthere were people rotating into the safety of Berkshire,‚Äù said Bill Stone, chief investment officer at Glenview Trust. But since then, investors have dumped value names and run back to fast-growing tech stocks. Stone said, ‚ÄúWhat is really moving in this market is technology, and we know that‚Äôs not really his thing.‚Äù He also compared Berkshire‚Äôs $344 billion in cash and Treasury investments to Fort Knox, but admitted that hasn‚Äôt been enough to stop the outflows. Warren sells stocks, stops buybacks, holds cash Warren has stopped buying back Berkshire shares too. That decision came as the company‚Äôs price-to-book ratio rose to 1.8 times, the highest level since October 2008. Berkshire only repurchases stock when Warren believes it‚Äôs trading below its ‚Äúintrinsic value.‚Äù That wasn‚Äôt the case in May. ‚ÄúThe stock was overvalued,‚Äù said Christopher Bloomstran, president of Semper Augustus Investments. Bloomstran added he expects Warren to return to buybacks now that the stock has dropped again. Instead of buying, Warren‚Äôs been selling. He dumped a large chunk of Apple last year, and for 11 straight quarters, Berkshire has been a net seller of equities. At the end of June, cash made up 30% of Berkshire‚Äôs total assets, showing just how defensive the company‚Äôs gotten. This isn‚Äôt new behavior from Warren. During the dotcom boom in 1999, he refused to chase hype. Berkshire‚Äôs stock trailed badly during that time, especially against the Nasdaq Composite. Critics slammed him for sitting out the tech rally, but when the bubble burst, Berkshire avoided the wreckage. This time, though, things are different. Cathy Seifert, analyst at CFRA, said Berkshire always had a ‚ÄúWarren premium,‚Äù but warned that may not stick under Abel. The next few quarters will show whether that legacy can hold. title: Tao Synergies TAO Holdings: A Strategic Leap in AI Crypto Investment
body: BitcoinWorld Tao Synergies TAO Holdings: A Strategic Leap in AI Crypto Investment The intersection of artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency continues to spark excitement, and a recent announcement from Nasdaq-listed Tao Synergies has certainly captured attention. The company, which focuses intently on the convergence between AI and crypto, revealed its current Tao Synergies TAO holdings , signaling a bold move into the decentralized AI landscape. This development is not just about numbers; it reflects a deeper commitment to the future of decentralized technologies. Unpacking the Tao Synergies TAO Holdings Announcement Tao Synergies recently made headlines with a significant disclosure: the company now holds a substantial amount of TAO tokens. Specifically, their treasury currently contains 42,111 TAO. This is a considerable figure, especially coming from a Nasdaq-listed entity known for its strategic vision in emerging tech sectors. Moreover, the company‚Äôs announcement wasn‚Äôt just about their existing stash. They also unveiled plans to continue acquiring TAO tokens. This ongoing purchasing initiative forms a crucial part of what Tao Synergies calls its TAO token strategy , aiming to build a robust treasury of these digital assets. What is Bittensor TAO and Why Does it Matter? To fully grasp the significance of Tao Synergies‚Äô move, one must understand the asset they are accumulating: TAO. TAO is the native token of Bittensor, a groundbreaking decentralized machine learning network. Unlike traditional centralized AI models, Bittensor allows participants to collaboratively train and operate AI models in a decentralized, peer-to-peer manner. The Bittensor network incentivizes participants ‚Äì from model trainers to validators ‚Äì using the Bittensor TAO token. This unique structure fosters innovation and democratizes access to AI development. Therefore, a significant investment in TAO by a public company like Tao Synergies validates the long-term potential of such decentralized AI paradigms. The Strategic Imperative Behind This TAO Token Strategy Why would a Nasdaq-listed company choose to hold such a substantial amount of a specific cryptocurrency? Tao Synergies‚Äô decision goes beyond mere speculation. Their TAO token strategy is deeply rooted in their core business focus: the convergence of AI and crypto. Key reasons for this strategic accumulation include: Alignment with Vision: Holding TAO directly aligns with Tao Synergies‚Äô mission to be at the forefront of AI and crypto innovation. Ecosystem Participation: Owning TAO allows for deeper participation in the Bittensor network, potentially enabling future collaborations or integration. Long-Term Value: The company likely sees long-term appreciation potential in TAO as the Bittensor network grows and decentralized AI gains wider adoption. Treasury Diversification: For a Nasdaq company crypto holdings can represent a strategic diversification of assets, particularly into high-growth, innovative sectors. This approach highlights a forward-thinking corporate treasury management, embracing digital assets that directly relate to their industry focus. The Broader Impact: AI and Crypto Convergence Tao Synergies‚Äô announcement sends a powerful signal across both the AI and cryptocurrency landscapes. It underscores the growing maturity and institutional acceptance of the AI and crypto convergence narrative. When a Nasdaq-listed company makes such a public commitment to a decentralized AI token, it can inspire confidence among other institutional players and traditional investors. This move suggests that the lines between traditional finance, cutting-edge AI, and decentralized ledger technology are blurring. It paves the way for more companies to explore similar strategies, integrating digital assets that power their core technological interests. While challenges like market volatility and regulatory clarity remain, the strategic investment by Tao Synergies demonstrates a clear path forward for corporate engagement in this innovative space. In conclusion, Tao Synergies‚Äô significant Tao Synergies TAO holdings represent more than just an investment; they signify a strategic endorsement of the decentralized AI movement. By committing to an ongoing TAO token strategy , the company is positioning itself at the vanguard of the AI and crypto convergence, highlighting the immense potential when these transformative technologies intersect. This bold step by a Nasdaq-listed entity could well be a harbinger of future institutional adoption within the dynamic world of decentralized artificial intelligence. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Tao Synergies? Tao Synergies is a Nasdaq-listed company that focuses on the convergence between artificial intelligence (AI) and cryptocurrency. They aim to leverage the strengths of both fields for innovative solutions. What is Bittensor and its TAO token? Bittensor is a decentralized machine learning network that allows participants to collaboratively train and operate AI models. TAO is its native token, used to incentivize network participants and facilitate operations within the ecosystem. Why is Tao Synergies investing in TAO tokens? Tao Synergies is acquiring TAO tokens as part of a strategic treasury strategy. This move aligns with their core focus on AI and crypto convergence, allowing them to participate in the Bittensor network and potentially benefit from the growth of decentralized AI. How significant are Tao Synergies‚Äô TAO holdings? Tao Synergies currently holds 42,111 TAO tokens. This is a notable amount for a Nasdaq-listed company, indicating a strong belief in the long-term value and strategic importance of Bittensor‚Äôs ecosystem. What does this investment mean for the AI and crypto market? This investment by a Nasdaq-listed company signals growing institutional confidence in the AI and crypto convergence. It validates the potential of decentralized AI projects like Bittensor and may encourage more traditional companies to explore similar strategic digital asset investments. title: How Policy, Innovation, and Market Dynamics Are Driving Institutional Crypto M&A
body: The financial services industry is at a crossroads, with an indisputable trend of financial services moving into crypto. Digital assets built on the blockchain are transforming the financial ecosystem and shaping its future. Digital assets are no longer living on the fringe of the global financial system ‚Äî they are becoming central to its future and to the movement of value through the capital markets and payments rails. The relatively small size of the crypto market pales to traditional financial markets, belying the enormous opportunity for digital assets and their growth trajectory. The total cryptocurrency market cap is approaching $3.8 trillion, approximating one segment of the MSCI World Index and dwarfed by the global market cap for equities, projected to reach $128.07 trillion this year. Yet, the capital markets environment is thriving, evidenced by Circle and eToro IPOs and these notable M&A trends: Partnerships : To deepen digital asset strategies ‚Äì Kraken / NinjaTrader ($1.5B); Coinbase / Derebit ($2.9B); Ripple / Hidden Road ($1.25B); and JPMorgan Chase linking customers to Coinbase wallets, enabling crypto wallet funding via credit card rewards and direct account funding. Private Equity: To enter new market sectors through a portfolio-based acquisition strategy ‚Äì Carlyle / SurePay (undisclosed); Bain Capital / Acrisure ($2.1B). Cross-Border Deals: To fortify digital transformation and gain a competitive advantage through broader market reach ‚Äì Robinhood / Bitstamp ($200M); Swyftx / Caleb & Brown ($100M-200M est.). This activity is being driven by a highly-anticipated shift in policy: Regulatory action by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in 2024 allowed the inclusion of bitcoin and ether in spot commodity-based ETFs. This action, accompanied by the Commodities Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) clarifying the regulatory framework for options on these ETFs, paved the way for institutional investors to enter the market. In Chairman Atkins‚Äô first major policy shift, the SEC inaugurated ‚ÄúProject Crypto‚Äù and approved in-kind redemptions for spot BTC and ETH ETFs, allowing authorized participants to create and redeem ETF shares directly in BTC or ETH. In coordination with ‚ÄúProject Crypto,‚Äù the CFTC Acting Chair Pham has initiated ‚ÄúCrypto Sprint,‚Äù seeking to enable ‚Äúimmediate trading of digital assets‚Äù on CFTC-registered exchanges. Also, the SEC‚Äôs Division of Corporation Finance stated that liquid staking activities covered in its statement issued yesterday do not involve the offer and sales of securities. Legislative action is taking shape with passage of the GENIUS Act and the CLARITY Act working its way through the Senate. It creates a regulatory framework underpinning ‚Äúdigital commodities‚Äù linked to the blockchain, excluding traditional products (bank deposits, commodities, securities, and investment vehicles) and divides primary regulatory oversight between the CFTC and SEC. Once enacted, regulators will be expected to quickly implement regulations and an interim registration framework. Also, the Senate Banking Committee released a discussion draft of the Responsible Financial Innovation Act to establish a larger role for the SEC than in the Clarity Act in classifying digital assets. The Trump administration heralded a new era for the growth of digital assets, reinforced in a comprehensive policy report released last week by the White House Working Group on Digital Asset Markets, with guidelines and recommendations covering stablecoins, digital asset market structure (including custody, token issuance and trading infrastructure), expanded CFTC regulatory authority and safe harbors for developers. Policy and capital markets activities are aligning. Crypto is no longer on the sidelines, it‚Äôs becoming core infrastructure for the future of finance. The changes we‚Äôve witnessed so far this year will undoubtedly lead to a robust finish for 2025.
tags: CoinDesk Indices|Institutional Investment|SEC|Regulation|M&A|CoinDesk Indices|Crypto Long & Short|Opinion|News

title: Kakao, One of South Korea's Leading Technology Companies, is Preparing to Enter the Stablecoin Sector! Here Are the Details
body: KakaoBank, the digital banking arm of Kakao, one of South Korea's leading technology companies, is preparing to make a strong entry into the country's rapidly developing stablecoin market. KakaoBank Signals Entry into South Korea's Stablecoin Market According to local media reports, KakaoBank Chief Financial Officer (CFO) Kwon Tae-hoon stated at the meeting where the bank announced its first-half 2025 financial results that it is evaluating various options in the digital finance arena. These options include issuing digital assets or offering custody services. Kwon emphasized that the online-only digital bank is working with Kakao Group's stablecoin task force to prepare for this. Speaking to ZDNet Korea, Kwon said: ‚ÄúThe most critical factors for stablecoins are stability and technological competence. For the past three years, we have been providing real-name accounts to cryptocurrency exchanges, effectively implementing risk management processes based on know-your-customer (KYC) and anti-money laundering (AML).‚Äù Kwon also stated that they participated in the South Korean Central Bank's digital currency (CBDC) trials and that they were operating digital wallet, transaction and money transfer infrastructures within this scope. Preparation for KRW-Based Stablecoin KakaoBank's move comes as the South Korean won (KRW)-based stablecoin market is taking shape, a space supported by recently inaugurated President Lee Jae Myung. During his election campaign, Lee promised to promote a local currency-based stablecoin market to prevent capital outflows. Following his election victory, a ruling party lawmaker introduced a bill to parliament that would establish a basic regulatory framework for KRW stablecoins. The private sector responded quickly to these developments. KakaoPay, the payments arm of Kakao Group, was one of the first to file trademark applications for stablecoin symbols in June. *This is not investment advice. title: AI Agents Unleash Secure Web Connectivity with Tavily‚Äôs $25M Funding
body: BitcoinWorld AI Agents Unleash Secure Web Connectivity with Tavily‚Äôs $25M Funding In the rapidly evolving digital landscape, where blockchain and cryptocurrencies are redefining financial paradigms, the integration of AI agents is becoming increasingly pivotal. For those deeply entrenched in the crypto space, understanding how AI can enhance security, automate complex tasks, and gather critical market intelligence is paramount. Imagine AI systems that can sift through vast amounts of transaction data to detect fraud in real-time or analyze market sentiment across various platforms. This is where the power of connected AI agents truly shines, and a recent development highlights a major leap forward in this crucial area. The Ascendance of AI Agents: Transforming Industries The deployment of AI agents is no longer a futuristic concept; it‚Äôs a present-day reality transforming operations across diverse sectors. From optimizing supply chains to personalizing customer experiences, these intelligent systems are automating a wide array of tasks previously handled by humans. In the financial sector, for instance, AI agents are indispensable for robust fraud detection, meticulously analyzing vast transaction datasets in real-time to flag anomalies. Similarly, sales organizations leverage these agents to meticulously gather data on potential customers, scouring the web and social media for invaluable insights. The core challenge, however, lies in enabling these agents to access the vast ocean of internet data effectively and responsibly. Tavily Funding: A $25 Million Vote of Confidence in Secure AI The significant Tavily funding round, amounting to $25 million, marks a pivotal moment for the future of compliant AI. Insight Partners led a substantial $20 million Series A investment, bringing the one-year-old startup‚Äôs total funding to this impressive sum. This investment underscores the urgent market need for solutions that bridge the gap between powerful large language models (LLMs) and the critical requirement for enterprise-grade security and compliance. Founded by data scientist Rotem Weiss, Tavily evolved from his viral open-source project, GPT Researcher, which demonstrated the early demand for real-time web data access for AI before LLMs had native internet connectivity. The transition from a consumer-focused tool to an enterprise solution highlights a strategic pivot towards addressing the most pressing challenges in AI deployment. Why Enterprise AI Demands Specialized Solutions? For enterprise AI applications, simply connecting an AI agent directly to a general-purpose LLM like ChatGPT without specific safeguards can lead to highly inappropriate or non-compliant results. George Mathew, managing director at Insight Partners, succinctly put it: ‚ÄúGovernance, risk and compliance at the enterprise is so important now, and if you just let that happen, it‚Äôs just going to be the wild, wild west.‚Äù This emphasizes the critical need for a structured and policy-driven approach to AI integration within large organizations. Enterprises require AI agents that can not only access the internet but also find information from relevant, trusted sources, all while strictly adhering to company policies and mirroring the meticulous work of a human researcher. Tavily‚Äôs suite of tools is designed precisely for this purpose, offering companies like Groq, Cohere, MongoDB, and Writer the capabilities to search, crawl, and extract structured insights from both public and private data sources. Revolutionizing AI Web Connectivity The ability of AI web connectivity is paramount for AI agents to move beyond static data and truly operate as dynamic, informed entities. Tavily addresses this by providing the necessary infrastructure for AI agents to intelligently navigate the internet. Unlike early LLMs that lacked real-time data access, modern AI agents require dynamic web interaction to stay current and effective. Tavily‚Äôs solutions enable agents to not only perform searches but also to crawl websites and extract structured insights, ensuring that the information gathered is relevant and actionable. While many AI agents are not yet fully connected to the internet, Tavily‚Äôs ambitious goal is to onboard the next billion agents to the web, democratizing access to real-time information for AI systems at scale. This connectivity is essential for tasks ranging from market research to competitive intelligence, ensuring AI systems can act on the most up-to-date information. Ensuring Robust AI Compliance and Governance The conversation around AI development increasingly centers on AI compliance and robust governance frameworks. In an era where data privacy regulations and ethical AI guidelines are becoming stricter, enterprises cannot afford to deploy AI agents without a clear strategy for adherence. Tavily‚Äôs core value proposition lies in its ability to connect AI agents to the web in a manner that is fully compliant with company-specific policies. This means integrating safeguards that prevent agents from accessing inappropriate content or violating data handling protocols. The platform helps mitigate risks associated with unchecked AI behavior, ensuring that automated tasks align with legal, ethical, and internal standards. This focus on governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) is what differentiates solutions like Tavily and is crucial for fostering trust and widespread adoption of AI within sensitive industries. The Competitive Landscape: Who Else is Powering AI Web Search? Tavily is certainly not alone in this burgeoning market. The demand for specialized search tools for AI agents has spurred innovation from several players. Competitors like Exa, which secured a $17 million Series A from Lightspeed, Nvidia, and YC, also offer solutions in this space. Another notable, albeit smaller, startup providing a web search connectivity layer is Firecrawl. Even industry giants like OpenAI and Perplexity are offering search solutions, though these are often geared more towards independent developers rather than the stringent enterprise requirements that Tavily targets. This competitive environment underscores the growing importance of intelligent web access for AI, highlighting a race to provide the most robust, compliant, and efficient solutions. Looking Ahead: The Future of Connected AI The vision articulated by Tavily‚Äôs founder, Rotem Weiss, to onboard the next billion AI agents to the web, speaks to a future where AI systems are deeply integrated with the vast resources of the internet, yet operate within defined boundaries. This level of sophisticated AI web connectivity will unlock unprecedented capabilities for businesses, allowing for real-time data analysis, proactive risk management, and highly informed decision-making. As industries continue to embrace automation and intelligent systems, the infrastructure provided by companies like Tavily will be fundamental to ensuring these powerful AI tools are deployed responsibly and effectively, safeguarding enterprise integrity while maximizing operational efficiency. Conclusion: Paving the Way for Responsible AI Adoption Tavily‚Äôs successful Tavily funding round is more than just a financial milestone; it represents a significant step forward in making advanced AI agents practical and safe for widespread enterprise AI adoption. By prioritizing compliant AI web connectivity and robust AI compliance , Tavily addresses the critical concerns that have historically hindered the full integration of AI into sensitive business operations. As the world moves towards an increasingly AI-driven future, solutions that balance innovation with governance will be paramount, ensuring that the transformative power of AI is harnessed responsibly and ethically for the benefit of all industries, including the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI models and their institutional adoption. This post AI Agents Unleash Secure Web Connectivity with Tavily‚Äôs $25M Funding first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Solana apps picked up the pace in July, with 50% revenue growth
body: All Solana apps picked up the pace in July, with 50% revenue growth. The network also achieved higher fees compared to all other L1 and L2 chains for ten months in a row. Solana apps reflected the increased liveliness of the crypto space, with revenues soaring by 50% in July. Total application revenue reached $164M for the previous month, with over $43M locked in during the week between 14 and 22 July. Solana app revenues picked up again in July, driven by trading tools and meme token swaps. | Source: Blockworks Solana is trying to accelerate its usage and go beyond meme tokens, though launch platforms remain among the top revenue producers. For the last weeks of July, the effect of LetsBonk.fun was reflected in total fees, as well as generally increased Phantom wallet usage for multiple on-chain tasks. The fee production on Solana also reveals the main use cases of the network and its potential to carry out additional tasks. Based on active users, Raydium lines up as the busiest app, followed by Pump.fun and Jupiter Exchange. Jito is among the leaders in terms of daily fees, reaching $1.54M, while Jupiter DEX and Meteora achieve days with over $3M in revenues. App results fluctuate based on short-term conditions. Most apps also got a boost from the growth of stablecoins on Solana, after USDC supply rose above 12B tokens and USDC broke above 2B. Solana trading tools and memes boost revenues The network is still far down from its peak revenue day on January 20, when fees reached $28.89M during the launch of the Official Trump (TRUMP) token. Since then, Solana fell to a lower baseline, with revenues driven by a mix of lending protocols and DEX. Despite the higher app revenues, fewer addresses engaged in Solana compared to June. Meme generation also switched to whale wallets and automated activities. Additionally, trading bots were among the most active fee producers on Solana. Trading tools as a class were the major source of revenues, followed by meme token trading. Solana still requires trading facilities, including routing services, bots, MEV services, and others, to complete a trade. The network is also separately producing block fees for its validators. While lending and DeFi are growing, the app share is still small compared to the use cases linked to token trading. Whales return to Solana SOL whales returned to Solana in July, once again a far cry from the January celebrity token era. Despite this, a total of five ‚ÄòSolana Lords‚Äô held more than 5M SOL for the month. Solana lords, whales with more than 5M SOL balance, increased in July, reaching the highest balance since January‚Äôs celebrity meme frenzy. | Source: Dune Analytics The Solana Lords metric is at the highest level for 2025, after some whales moved away following January‚Äôs rise in celebrity meme tokens. In addition to whale activity, Solana‚Äôs liveliness peaked around the middle of the month, with 17.93% of the supply turning active. SOL is viewed as the next potential valuable asset for ETFs and corporate treasuries, leading to a rush to acquire or move tokens. The native SOL token was up 11.3% net for the whole month, and is up 8.3% net in the third quarter to date. The token gained 24.2% in the first quarter, retaining its momentum. SOL recovered to $167.62 after the latest market dip, after recovering the $200 price range briefly. Cryptopolitan Academy: Coming Soon - A New Way to Earn Passive Income with DeFi in 2025. Learn More

title: Ethereum‚Äôs Astounding Ascent: Can ETH Truly Become the Ultimate Long-Term Value Asset?
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum‚Äôs Astounding Ascent: Can ETH Truly Become the Ultimate Long-Term Value Asset? The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with a bold prediction: could Ethereum truly surpass Bitcoin as the leading Ethereum long-term value asset? A recent VanEck report certainly thinks so, sparking an important debate around the future of ETH vs Bitcoin in the digital asset landscape. This isn‚Äôt just about price; it‚Äôs about fundamental utility and economic design that could reshape the crypto investment landscape. Why is Ethereum‚Äôs Long-Term Value Gaining Astounding Traction? VanEck‚Äôs July report provides compelling reasons why Ethereum‚Äôs long-term value proposition is strengthening. One key factor highlighted is Ethereum‚Äôs significantly lower inflation rate, sitting at a mere 0.2% compared to Bitcoin‚Äôs approximately 3%. This stark difference contributes to Ethereum‚Äôs appeal as a sustainable crypto store of value . Furthermore, the introduction of Ethereum staking after the Merge has transformed its economic model. Staking offers participants a yield, effectively turning ETH into a productive asset. This mechanism, combined with its deflationary tendencies through transaction fee burning, gives Ethereum a unique edge. It makes ETH more attractive for those seeking both capital appreciation and potential income. The Evolving Battle for Supremacy: ETH vs Bitcoin For years, Bitcoin has held the crown as ‚Äúdigital gold,‚Äù primarily valued for its scarcity and decentralized nature. However, the report suggests that Ethereum‚Äôs flexible utility offers a different, potentially superior, path for long-term appeal. While Bitcoin‚Äôs use case remains largely static as a store of value, Ethereum powers a vast ecosystem. Think about it: Ethereum is the backbone for decentralized finance (DeFi), non-fungible tokens (NFTs), and countless decentralized applications (dApps). This inherent utility and programmability make Ethereum a dynamic asset, constantly evolving and expanding its potential applications. This contrasts sharply with Bitcoin‚Äôs more singular focus, leading many to reconsider the dynamics of ETH vs Bitcoin for future treasury holdings. Unpacking Robust Institutional Ethereum Adoption and Staking Benefits A significant indicator of growing confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs future is the increasing rate of Institutional Ethereum adoption. The VanEck report reveals that institutional ETH holdings have now reached an impressive 8.2 million ETH, representing 6.8% of the total supply. This isn‚Äôt just retail interest; major players are accumulating. For example, Bitmine Immersion leads the pack with a substantial 625,000 ETH in their portfolio. What drives this institutional interest? Beyond its utility, the attractive yield from Ethereum staking plays a crucial role. Institutions can earn passive income on their holdings, adding another layer of value to their investment strategy. This makes Ethereum not just a speculative asset, but one that can generate returns. What Does This Mean for the Future of Crypto Value? The insights from VanEck paint a compelling picture. Ethereum‚Äôs combination of lower inflation, a productive Ethereum staking yield, expansive utility, and growing Institutional Ethereum adoption positions it as a formidable contender for the ultimate crypto store of value . While Bitcoin‚Äôs legacy is undeniable, Ethereum‚Äôs dynamic nature and evolving economic model present a strong case for its potential to eventually surpass BTC in Ethereum long-term value and treasury appeal. This shift in perspective suggests that the market may increasingly favor assets that offer both scarcity and utility. As the digital economy matures, assets like Ethereum, with their multifaceted use cases, could redefine what it means to be a foundational long-term investment in the crypto space. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is VanEck‚Äôs main prediction about Ethereum? A1: VanEck‚Äôs report suggests that Ethereum has the potential to surpass Bitcoin as a long-term value asset, primarily due to its lower inflation, staking yield, and flexible utility. Q2: How does Ethereum‚Äôs inflation rate compare to Bitcoin‚Äôs? A2: Ethereum‚Äôs inflation rate is significantly lower at approximately 0.2%, compared to Bitcoin‚Äôs around 3%, making ETH a more deflationary asset over time. Q3: What role does Ethereum staking play in its long-term value? A3: Ethereum staking allows holders to earn a yield on their ETH, transforming it into a productive asset. This passive income potential, combined with deflationary mechanics, enhances its appeal as a long-term investment. Q4: Why are institutions increasingly interested in Ethereum? A4: Institutions are attracted to Ethereum due to its growing utility across DeFi and NFTs, its deflationary nature, and the attractive yields offered through Institutional Ethereum staking programs, making it a compelling treasury asset. Q5: What are the key differences in utility between ETH and Bitcoin? A5: Bitcoin‚Äôs primary utility is as a decentralized store of value (‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù). Ethereum, on the other hand, offers broad utility as a platform for smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), DeFi, and NFTs, making it a dynamic and programmable asset. Share Your Insights! Did this article shed new light on Ethereum‚Äôs potential? We encourage you to share this analysis with your network on social media! Your insights and discussions help us explore the evolving crypto landscape together. To learn more about the latest Ethereum trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption. This post Ethereum‚Äôs Astounding Ascent: Can ETH Truly Become the Ultimate Long-Term Value Asset? first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Coinbase stock dropped 17% after weak earnings, ending its blue-chip rally
body: Coinbase hit $106 billion in value after joining the S&P 500 earlier this year, riding a 69% rally that pushed it to the front of the crypto-to-Wall-Street pipeline. That run ended hard last week when the stock dropped 17% after its earnings release, the second-biggest post-earnings dip in the company‚Äôs history. Analysts are now asking whether Coinbase can keep charging higher fees without losing ground to cheaper competitors. For years, the company ignored pressure to drop its fees, even increasing them in March for some stablecoin trades. But the game has changed. Robinhood and Kraken are closing in fast, and Gemini and Bullish are getting ready to go public. ‚ÄúWe still see long-term risks to their growth due to above-average retail transaction fees and increasing competition from platforms like Robinhood,‚Äù said Alex Woodard, an analyst at Arca. Robinhood, Kraken, Gemini heat up the competition Robinhood charges roughly half what Coinbase does, based on estimates from Mizuho. Kraken is expanding beyond crypto by adding stocks and ETFs to keep users inside its app longer. Meanwhile, Bitcoin has stabilized, and that‚Äôs giving users space to think about where they trade and what it costs. All of this is forcing Coinbase into a corner. The company either lowers prices and sacrifices margins or holds prices and loses users. Brian Armstrong, who co-founded Coinbase in 2012, took it public in 2021. That gave him a head start on most of the industry, as Coinbase became the main place to trade crypto for both retail users and big institutions in the U.S. On last week‚Äôs earnings call, Chief Financial Officer Alesia Haas said part of the trading slowdown was linked to Coinbase‚Äôs decision to start charging for stablecoin trading pairs, a segment that had mostly been free. ‚ÄúThis was in our control,‚Äù Alesia told shareholders. ‚ÄúWhen you exclude the impact of lower stable-pair volume, our total trading volume was more similar to the overall spot markets.‚Äù Coinbase framed the move as a tradeoff, betting on margin instead of user growth. A company spokesperson allegedly told Bloomberg in an email, ‚ÄúAs more players enter crypto, it‚Äôs a sign the space is going mainstream. That‚Äôs good for the ecosystem, but we‚Äôre here to win.‚Äù Whether that win comes with fewer users or not is the big question. Coinbase leans on expansion plans Coinbase isn‚Äôt sitting still. It‚Äôs planning to offer stock trading and expand its custody services, which already serve institutional products like Bitcoin ETFs. It bought Deribit and added perpetual-style futures contracts for U.S. users. It wants to become the ‚Äúeverything exchange,‚Äù with plans to include prediction markets next. It still has over $9 billion in cash and revenue coming in from its partnership with stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group. But a big part of its business still relies on people trading crypto. Dan Dolev, an analyst at Mizuho, said that full dependency on trading is dangerous. He explained, ‚ÄúEither way, being so fully dependent on crypto trading is risky.‚Äù But again, competition is turning up the heat. OKX is back in the U.S. market. Binance, even with its legal troubles, was reportedly talking to World Liberty Financial, a crypto venture owned by the Trump family. Despite the pressure, Coinbase still trades at about 44 times forward earnings. That‚Äôs higher than old-school exchanges but lower than Robinhood‚Äôs 65. It‚Äôs nowhere near Circle‚Äôs multiple. But even that premium is in danger. H.C. Wainwright downgraded the stock in July, warning that the competitive squeeze could impact its valuation. Oppenheimer‚Äôs Owen Lau is still optimistic. He expects a 46% revenue rebound in the third quarter. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think COIN‚Äôs valuation is out of reach,‚Äù Lau said. ‚ÄúIt is trading at a big discount compared to HOOD and CRCL. I think if they can continue to grow both top and bottom line, it will help.‚Äù Get seen where it counts. Advertise in Cryptopolitan Research and reach crypto‚Äôs sharpest investors and builders.

title: Top Crypto Sportsbook Promotions: Learn How Spartans‚Äô $200 Bonus Structure Differs from Rollbit‚Äôs and Gamdom‚Äôs Reward Models
body: Crypto sports betting is no longer a fringe hobby, it‚Äôs a preferred choice for bettors who value speed, privacy, and decentralized transactions. But not all crypto sportsbooks treat bonuses the same way. Some rely on opaque leveling systems or vague cashback mechanics, while others offer structured rewards that truly benefit the user. This article compares three platforms, Spartans , Rollbit, and Gamdom, to determine which one offers the most crypto-friendly bonus experience. If you‚Äôre looking for the top crypto sportsbook promotions in 2025, read on. Spartans: Structured Bonuses That Reward Crypto Users Spartans has quickly become a go-to for crypto bettors who want real rewards, not just flashy interfaces. The sportsbook‚Äôs promotions are designed with crypto users in mind, supporting Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Avalanche, and more. Instead of vague point systems or casino-only perks, Spartans delivers two key promotions: a 300% sports welcome bonus and a 25% daily deposit bonus, both fully compatible with crypto wallets. The 300% sports bonus kicks off with a low $5 minimum deposit and goes up to $200 in bonus value. Wagering requirements are clear, 10x the bonus amount, with reasonable odds requirements that don‚Äôt limit player strategy. That means you can bet on what you actually want, whether it‚Äôs a UFC main event or Champions League action. The bonus is valid for seven days, and users can withdraw up to ten times the bonus amount if they meet the requirements. The 25% daily deposit bonus gives returning users something to work with every single day. With just a $10 deposit, crypto users can access up to $50 in extra funds for sports betting. The wagering multiple is just 8x, and the bonus supports football and basketball markets, with fair odds minimums. Compared to other platforms, Spartans has found the sweet spot between accessibility and meaningful reward. It‚Äôs consistent, transparent, and gives crypto users exactly what they expect: frictionless value. Rollbit: Cashback Without Clarity Rollbit takes a different approach. Rather than structured bonuses, it leans into a rakeback model based on user wagering activity. While this sounds great in theory, the execution is murky. Cashback percentages fluctuate based on player volume, engagement, and account tier, but these tiers aren‚Äôt always clearly explained. Crypto users often find themselves playing without knowing when or how much they‚Äôll get back. For high-volume players or those engaged in Rollbit‚Äôs other features like trading or NFTs, the rakeback may seem attractive. But for the average sports bettor who deposits crypto and wants to wager on matches, there‚Äôs a noticeable lack of upfront value. There‚Äôs no guaranteed welcome bonus for sports betting, and no daily or weekly deposit match that makes crypto go further. For users who want immediate value from their deposits and bonuses that clearly apply to the sportsbook, Rollbit‚Äôs approach falls short. It rewards loyalty, sure, but in a system that feels random unless you‚Äôre heavily invested in the platform already. Gamdom: Leveling That Leaves Players Guessing Gamdom introduces a level-based rewards system where users climb ranks to unlock bonuses. The site supports crypto deposits and has built a loyal following, but the promotional structure can be a barrier for those who expect instant rewards. The leveling process is tied to volume and time, meaning you have to wager significantly before seeing any tangible return. While Gamdom does offer occasional promotions or targeted bonuses, they tend to lack consistency. The value of the rewards at each level isn‚Äôt always disclosed ahead of time, which makes it hard to calculate expected returns. There‚Äôs also no dedicated sportsbook welcome bonus that directly benefits crypto bettors. Most of the perks come through leveling or temporary events, which may or may not align with the user‚Äôs active betting period. For casual players or anyone new to crypto sports betting, this system can feel more like a game of chance than a reward engine. Compared to Spartans, which offers upfront, guaranteed bonuses with clear crypto compatibility, Gamdom‚Äôs format is better suited to long-haul users who are willing to grind their way to unknown rewards. Spartans Sets the Standard for Crypto Bonus Clarity When evaluating the top crypto sportsbook promotions in 2025, Spartans stands out as the most balanced, rewarding, and transparent option. Its combination of a 300% welcome bonus and a 25% daily bonus delivers immediate value to crypto bettors without forcing them into confusing tiers or abstract cashback loops. The bonuses are easy to trigger, tied directly to real crypto deposits, and offer realistic terms that players can actually meet. Rollbit and Gamdom may have built-in reward systems, but neither offers the same level of clarity or instant value. For users who deposit crypto and expect structured bonuses in return, Spartans provides the clearest path to boosted bankrolls and real withdrawal potential. It‚Äôs not about gimmicks or hidden mechanics, it‚Äôs about giving crypto sports bettors what they deserve: full control, fast payouts, and bonuses that deliver. title: Meme Coins Are Loud Again, and One Question Hangs in the Air, Pepeto Or Doge?
body: Crypto has found its voice again. Prices are shifting, traders are leaning into risk, and the loudest moves are happening in meme coins. Everyone recognizes the old champion: Dogecoin , but another name is starting to echo across chat groups and forums: Pepeto . DOGE has woken up, flashing a spark we haven‚Äôt seen in a long while. title: Hyperliquid Whale‚Äôs Astounding Move: Halving BTC Short Losses
body: BitcoinWorld Hyperliquid Whale‚Äôs Astounding Move: Halving BTC Short Losses The volatile world of cryptocurrency trading often brings forth stories of immense gains and, sometimes, significant reversals. Recently, a notable development on the Hyperliquid platform caught the attention of the crypto community: a prominent Hyperliquid whale , known as ‚Äú@qwatio,‚Äù made a decisive move to halve a substantial Bitcoin (BTC) short position. This action highlights the inherent risks and dynamic nature of crypto trading losses , even for experienced market participants. What Prompted This Hyperliquid Whale‚Äôs Strategic Shift? On-chain analyst EmberCN, a well-regarded voice on X, first brought this intriguing situation to light. EmberCN identified ‚Äú@qwatio‚Äù as an ‚Äúinsider,‚Äù suggesting a deeper understanding of market dynamics or perhaps even privileged information. Initially, this whale‚Äôs BTC short position was immensely profitable, boasting an unrealized gain of a staggering $26 million. However, market shifts quickly turned the tide. The unrealized profits vanished. The position instead accumulated $2 million in losses. This rapid reversal compelled ‚Äú@qwatio‚Äù to act. This dramatic swing from significant profit to a notable loss underscores the unpredictable nature of leveraged trading on platforms like Hyperliquid. Understanding the Dynamics of a BTC Short Position and On-Chain Analysis A BTC short position essentially means betting on a price decline. Traders open shorts when they expect Bitcoin‚Äôs value to fall, hoping to buy back at a lower price and profit from the difference. When the market moves against a short, as it did for ‚Äú@qwatio,‚Äù losses begin to mount. This is where on-chain analysis becomes crucial. Analysts like EmberCN monitor public blockchain data to track large transactions and significant wallet movements, providing insights into the actions of major players, or ‚Äúwhales.‚Äù Their reports offer a transparent look into market sentiment and potential trends. Navigating Crypto Trading Losses: A Whale‚Äôs Perspective Why would a trader, even one with the capital of a whale, cut losses after such a massive reversal? This decision, while painful, is often a core component of a sound whale trading strategy . Allowing losses to accumulate indefinitely can lead to even greater financial damage or even liquidation, where the exchange automatically closes the position. Halving the short means reducing exposure and preserving capital, even if it locks in existing losses. It‚Äôs a strategic retreat to fight another day, rather than a full capitulation. Risk Management: Prioritizing capital preservation. Market Volatility: Acknowledging unpredictable swings. Adaptability: Adjusting to changing market conditions. This move by the Hyperliquid whale serves as a powerful reminder that even the biggest players face challenges and must adapt to survive in the volatile crypto markets. What Can Traders Learn from This Hyperliquid Whale‚Äôs Action? The case of ‚Äú@qwatio‚Äù offers valuable lessons for all traders, regardless of their capital size. Firstly, it emphasizes that unrealized profits are just that ‚Äì unrealized. Market conditions can change rapidly, turning fortunes overnight. Secondly, it highlights the importance of having a robust risk management plan, including clear stop-loss levels or strategies for cutting losses. Finally, observing the actions revealed by on-chain analysis can provide insights into how large entities manage their positions, offering a glimpse into professional trading psychology. Never rely solely on unrealized gains. Implement strict risk management. Learn from experienced traders and on-chain insights. This incident on Hyperliquid reinforces the unpredictable nature of crypto, urging traders to remain vigilant and disciplined. The recent move by the Hyperliquid whale , ‚Äú@qwatio,‚Äù to halve a significant BTC short position after experiencing a substantial profit reversal into losses, provides a compelling narrative from the front lines of crypto trading. It underscores the critical importance of adaptable strategies and stringent risk management, even for those with deep pockets. As the crypto markets continue their dynamic dance, stories like these serve as crucial reminders that discipline and quick decision-making are paramount for navigating both immense potential and unforeseen challenges. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Who is ‚Äú@qwatio‚Äù and what is their significance? ‚Äú@qwatio‚Äù is a pseudonymous trader on Hyperliquid, described by analyst EmberCN as an ‚Äúinsider‚Äù or ‚Äúwhale‚Äù due to their large trading positions, like the significant BTC short. Their actions are noteworthy because they can influence market sentiment or reflect informed perspectives. What is a BTC short position? A BTC short position is a trading strategy where an investor borrows Bitcoin and sells it, expecting its price to fall. The goal is to buy it back at a lower price later, return the borrowed Bitcoin, and profit from the price difference. What is Hyperliquid? Hyperliquid is a decentralized perpetual exchange that allows users to trade various cryptocurrencies with high leverage. It‚Äôs known for its speed and on-chain operations. How did ‚Äú@qwatio‚Äù‚Äòs position go from profit to loss? Initially, Bitcoin‚Äôs price likely dropped, allowing ‚Äú@qwatio‚Äù‚Äòs short position to accrue $26 million in unrealized profits. However, a subsequent increase in Bitcoin‚Äôs price would have caused these profits to vanish and turn into losses, reaching $2 million. Why did the whale cut their losses instead of waiting? Cutting losses is a fundamental risk management strategy. By halving the position, ‚Äú@qwatio‚Äù reduced their exposure to further price increases, preventing potentially larger losses or even a forced liquidation of their entire position. It prioritizes capital preservation. Did this intriguing story of the Hyperliquid whale resonate with you? Share your thoughts on risk management in crypto trading! Join the conversation and spread the knowledge by sharing this article on your social media channels. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Hyperliquid Whale‚Äôs Astounding Move: Halving BTC Short Losses first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Succinct (PROVE) Token Surges 34% After Bitget Listing and Mainnet Launch
body: Succinct, a decentralized prover network revolutionizing zero-knowledge (ZK) infrastructure, has officially launched its mainnet and native token, PROVE. The launch, which took place on August 5, 2025, marks a major milestone in the evolution of cryptographic verifiability and scalability in the Web3 ecosystem. Related Reading: $255 Solana? Supply Shock Fuels Bullish Forecast Following the mainnet debut, the PROVE token was listed on Bitget, a leading global cryptocurrency exchange. Within 24 hours, the token surged by over 50%, reaching a trading price of $1.50 and generating over $715 million in 24-hour volume. Bitget‚Äôs Succinct (PROVE) Listing Fuels Market Momentum Bitget added PROVE to its Innovation Zone, opening spot trading for the PROVE/USDT pair on August 5, 2025. To incentivize adoption, the exchange launched a CandyBomb campaign featuring 66,666 PROVE in total rewards for traders and depositors. This strategic listing allows users to engage with PROVE through both trading and staking activities. The token will also be listed on Binance, where it carries a Seed Tag and supports multiple trading pairs, further increasing its visibility and liquidity. Succinct (PROVE) is trading near $1.2 and analysts note signs of consolidation ahead of a possible surge. PROVE's price trends to the upside on low timeframes, following its debut on major crypto exchanges. Source: PROVEUSD on Tradingview Powering the Future of ZK Infrastructure The PROVE token is the backbone of the Succinct Prover Network, a decentralized, two-sided marketplace where developers request ZK proofs and independent provers compete to fulfill them. Unlike traditional systems that require complex and costly infrastructure, Succinct simplifies the integration of ZK proofs via a general-purpose zkVM that supports languages like Rust. Currently, the network supports 35+ protocols, has processed over 5 million proofs, and secures more than $4 billion in value. Notable partners include Polygon, Mantle, Lido, and Celestia. Looking Ahead Succinct‚Äôs approach to verifiable computation is drawing comparisons to foundational internet protocols, with CTO John Guibas noting, ‚ÄúOur goal was to make proving infrastructure accessible at internet scale.‚Äù With strong developer traction, dual exchange listings, and a scalable infrastructure model, Succinct is well-positioned to become a core component of blockchain scalability and privacy. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Crash To $100,000 Or Rally To $122,000? Analyst Shows Game Plan For BTC As zero-knowledge proofs move toward mainstream adoption, the PROVE token and its underlying network could be a notable mention in shaping the next era of dApps. title: Bitcoin Is An Unstoppable Freedom Virus Spreading Rapidly Across Nations: Michael Saylor
body: In the dynamic world of finance, Bitcoin has emerged as a leading asset, regarded as a reliable store of value and a hedge against failing financial systems. BTC continues to maintain its reputation as a hedge, with many prominent figures in the sector claiming that the asset could spur financial freedom and independence. The Bitcoin Freedom Wave Is Spreading Michael Saylor, the outspoken Bitcoin advocate and executive chairman of MicroStrategy, has once again made waves in the crypto world by declaring that Bitcoin is an unstoppable asset that drives financial freedom. Saylor‚Äôs statement comes in the midst of growing institutional interest in BTC, as big firms rapidly accumulate the crypto king. In the interview with Fox Business shared by Coin Bureau on the X platform, Saylor called BTC a freedom virus based on a monetary and truth virus. This underscores the digital asset‚Äôs function as a global force for monetary independence and resistance to centralized control, presenting it as more than just a financial tool . With BTC gaining mainstream recognition, the chairman considers the asset a swarm creature due to the robust support for the Bitcoin ecosystem across the world. According to Saylor, there will always be individuals supporting BTC with their electricity, computer power, political power, and economic power, which reinforces its presence in the financial sector. Saylor believes Bitcoin is unstoppable at this point, comparing its stability to a swarm of hornets. He further stated that BTC is currently spreading rapidly throughout the world, demonstrating robust strength on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis. As economic uncertainty endures and mistrust of established traditional systems increases, Saylor‚Äôs bold declaration reinforces the ongoing notion that Bitcoin is more than just a store of value . The crypto king has become a fast-growing movement that is changing the way the world thinks about finance and freedom. Treasury Companies Revolutionizing BTC Investments Strategy‚Äôs unwavering confidence toward Bitcoin is now being emulated by several large treasury companies seeking to own a BTC reserve . Such growing interest among institutions is revolutionizing BTC investments in recent times. Presently, companies like Strategy and Metaplanet are accelerating BTC‚Äôs journey to becoming a global reserve asset. According to Degen Station, this is making it possible for institutions to buy stocks or bonds backed by BTC, unlike before, when they were unable to purchase spot BTC due to constraints. Degen Station noted that these firms are currently using smart leverage, which is safer than margin or daily-reset ETFs , because they have access to long-term corporate debt. Addressing potential misunderstandings, the market experts stated that this is a normal aspect of BTC‚Äôs adoption curve and does not pose a danger to its ethos.

title: PancakeSwap Brings Apple, Amazon, Tesla Perpetuals to DeFi Traders
body: PancakeSwap adds perpetual swaps on AAPL, AMZN, TSLA shares to DeFi trading platform. Major crypto/forex pairs offer 24/7 trading; stocks follow the traditional market schedule. Platform upgrades, price oracles, and user wallet trading boost DEX growth. Decentralized exchange PancakeSwap has added support for perpetual swaps on Apple, Amazon, and Tesla shares, according to the platform's blog. Contracts for AAPL, AMZN, and TSLA track stock prices on traditional markets, but their trading is limited to standard exchange sessions. Crypto and forex pairs like BTCUSD, ETHUSD, BNBUSD, EURUSD, and GBPUSD remain available for trading 24 hours a day. PancakeSwap‚Äôs perpetual swaps allow traders to speculate on stock prices with up to 25x leverage while maintaining full control over their assets. The DEX plans to expand the list of available instruments in the coming months. The exchange introduced PancakeSwap Perpetuals in 2022. Last October, the platform released a major upgrade featuring a revamped interface and a liquidity engine utilizing the ALP pool. The trading platform has also integrated price oracles from Pyth, Binance Oracle, and Chainlink, and removed the order book. PancakeSwap users can trade directly from their wallets without transferring assets to the exchange. For large pairs like BTC/USDT, the platform supports leverage up to 150x. Growth and Market Position According to DeFi Llama, PancakeSwap is the second-largest decentralized exchange (DEX), with daily trading volume exceeding $1.7 billion. The platform‚Äôs total value locked (TVL) stands at $2.01 billion. In July, PancakeSwap generated more than $28.6 million in revenue and processed $146.6 million in trading fees. Despite these developments, its native token CAKE showed minimal price response, rising just 0.5% in the past 24 hours.

title: Ex-SEC Lawyer: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre Presumably Still Waiting On Another Vote‚Äù In XRP Case
body: A new legal insight from former SEC official Marc Fagel has sparked renewed attention in the XRP community, as the long-running legal battle between Ripple and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) appears to remain stalled due to internal procedural delays. According to Fagel, another vote from the SEC Commissioners may still be required before the final judgment can be approved. This revelation, shared by STEPH IS CRYPTO on X, comes amid rising investor anticipation for closure in the high-profile lawsuit. The Exchange That Raised the Alarm Attorney Bill Morgan, a vocal supporter of Ripple, recently engaged in a discussion with Marc Fagel, former regional director at the SEC. Morgan asked whether another Commission vote was necessary to finalize the settlement and dismiss the case. BREAKING: EX-SEC OFFICIAL FAGEL: ‚ÄúWE‚ÄôRE PRESUMABLY STILL WAITING ON ANOTHER VOTE‚Äù IN #XRP CASE. ORIGINAL APPROVAL DIDN‚ÄôT COVER INJUNCTION MODIFICATION. pic.twitter.com/fyaCl4NElp ‚Äî STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) August 6, 2025 Fagel responded that while there was a slim chance the original vote covered everything, including the modification of the existing injunction, the delay in court proceedings made it clear that this likely wasn‚Äôt the case. His conclusion: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre presumably still waiting on another vote.‚Äù STEPH IS CRYPTO brought this exchange to the forefront in a post that read: ‚ÄúBreaking: Ex-SEC official Fagel: ‚ÄòWe‚Äôre presumably still waiting on another vote‚Äô in XRP case. Original approval didn‚Äôt cover injunction modification.‚Äù This pointed statement has raised critical questions about what exactly is holding up the final steps in one of crypto‚Äôs most closely watched legal battles. Why Another SEC Vote Matters At the center of the delay is the issue of injunctive relief‚Äîa court-imposed order that restricts certain actions by Ripple. While the SEC and Ripple reached a settlement agreement in June 2025, Judge Analisa Torres rejected their jointly proposed motion , thus allowing for the appeal to continue. Under SEC procedures, any material change to an enforcement case‚Äîparticularly involving injunctions‚Äîtypically requires a formal vote from the five-member Commission. If the modification to the injunctive order wasn‚Äôt included in the original approval, a new vote must occur. Fagel‚Äôs remarks strongly suggest that this step hasn‚Äôt yet been taken. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Lingering Uncertainty Despite Partial Resolution The lawsuit, filed in December 2020, has already seen several major developments. In July 2023, Judge Torres ruled that XRP is not a security when sold on public exchanges, delivering a partial win to Ripple. However, the judge also found that Ripple‚Äôs past institutional sales did violate securities laws, and this portion of the case remained open for penalties. Following a failed resolution attempt, Ripple opted to drop its counter-appeal; the SEC appeals are also expected to be dropped, as indicated by Garlinghouse and other insiders. But the unresolved issue of the injunction continues to block a formal closure of the case. A Waiting Game for XRP Holders Until the SEC takes the necessary procedural step, presumably, another vote to drop its appeal, the case remains open. The XRP community, which has endured nearly five years of legal uncertainty, remains on edge. For now, all eyes are on the SEC. Whether a new vote happens soon will determine when, and if, the Ripple case can finally be put to rest. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: AI Payments Breakthrough: Lava Payments Secures $5.8M for Next-Gen Digital Wallets
body: BitcoinWorld AI Payments Breakthrough: Lava Payments Secures $5.8M for Next-Gen Digital Wallets In the rapidly evolving landscape of artificial intelligence, a new challenge has emerged: how do AI agents efficiently handle transactions? Imagine a world where your AI assistant needs to pay for every piece of information or service it accesses online, constantly asking for your approval or needing new subscriptions. This friction is exactly what Lava Payments aims to eliminate, positioning itself at the forefront of the next wave of AI payments . Revolutionizing Transactions: Why AI Payments Are Essential? The digital frontier is rapidly being reshaped by autonomous AI agents, capable of performing complex tasks on behalf of users. However, as these agents become more sophisticated, a fundamental hurdle arises: how do they pay for the services and data they consume without constant human intervention? This was the core problem identified by Mitchell Jones, founder of Lava Payments, after his tenure at a Y Combinator-backed fintech startup, Lendtable. Jones‚Äôs personal experience highlighted a significant inefficiency. While experimenting with AI applications, he found himself spending hundreds of dollars just to build a basic form-filling agent. The issue wasn‚Äôt the cost of the core AI models themselves, but the repetitive nature of payments. He realized that using the same underlying models through different platforms or ‚Äòwrappers‚Äô meant constantly re-subscribing, re-authenticating, and paying separately, even though he had already paid for access to the core model. ‚ÄúI kept running into the same issue,‚Äù Jones explained. ‚ÄúI was using the same underlying models and tools again and again, but through different wrappers or platforms.‚Äù This fractured payment experience felt fundamentally broken. What was needed, he concluded, was a unified system ‚Äì a single wallet, one set of credits, and the freedom to move between tools and providers without starting over every time. This realization sparked the idea for Lava Payments: to create a seamless, developer-friendly system for AI and agent-driven transactions. Lava Payments: Ushering in a New Era of Digital Wallets Lava Payments is designed to be the definitive solution for the fragmented world of AI-driven transactions. At its core, Lava introduces a revolutionary concept of digital wallets that operate on a system of ‚Äòusage credits.‚Äô This innovative approach allows merchants to enable the Lava wallet for their customers, who can then upload credits to it. The brilliance lies in the universality of these credits: once loaded, they can be used across any merchant that accepts Lava, as well as foundational AI models like GPT and Claude, all on a ‚Äòpay-as-you-go‚Äô basis. Consider the traditional payment model for AI agents versus Lava‚Äôs streamlined approach: Feature Traditional AI Agent Payments Lava Payments for AI Agents Payment Method Multiple subscriptions, credit cards, manual approvals Single digital wallet with usage credits Transaction Flow Frequent interruptions, re-authentication for each service Seamless, frictionless, autonomous transactions Cost Efficiency Potential for redundant payments for core models Pay-as-you-go, optimized usage of credits User Experience Frustrating, time-consuming approvals Effortless, truly autonomous agent operations This streamlined approach means that instead of asking a user to approve transaction after transaction, an AI agent can simply charge from a pre-funded usage credit as it performs various tasks. Jones draws an analogy to accessing the internet: ‚ÄúWithout Lava, agents can‚Äôt move smoothly through the internet because they constantly get blocked when it comes time to pay.‚Äù Just as you don‚Äôt pay Google for every map view because you‚Äôve already paid your internet provider, Lava ensures AI agents can operate freely once credits are established. Building the Foundation of the Agent-Native Economy Lava Payments is not just building a payment platform; it is laying the groundwork for what Mitchell Jones calls the ‚Äú agent-native economy .‚Äù This concept envisions a future where autonomous AI agents are not just tools, but active participants in the digital marketplace, capable of transacting and interacting without human oversight for every single payment. The focus is on creating an interconnected ecosystem where agents can seamlessly move and conduct business across different platforms and services. ‚ÄúWe see the world as very interconnected,‚Äù Jones stated, highlighting Lava‚Äôs unique differentiator from other startups in this space, such as Metronome. While others might focus on specific payment niches, Lava‚Äôs broader vision is to become the ‚Äúinvisible layer that kind of powers the AI web.‚Äù This means ensuring that as AI agents increasingly find themselves in the checkout line, they are empowered to transact and build without friction. The core philosophy is simple yet profound: enable AI to be truly autonomous in its financial interactions. This liberation from constant payment prompts and re-authentications is crucial for the proliferation and utility of advanced AI agents across various industries, from customer service to complex data analysis. Lava is designed to make AI accessible and functional for everyone, fostering an environment where even a kid from Dayton, Ohio, can leverage powerful AI tools without financial barriers impeding their innovation. Strategic Fintech Innovation and Funding Success The promise of Lava Payments has not gone unnoticed by investors. The startup recently announced a significant milestone: a successful $5.8 million seed funding round. This substantial investment was led by prominent venture capital firm Lerer Hippeau, a testament to the compelling vision and potential impact of Lava‚Äôs fintech innovation . Mitchell Jones‚Äôs journey to this funding success is a story of perseverance and strategic networking. Born to a working family in Dayton, Ohio, Jones absorbed the foundational advice of hard work, saving, and education. This ethos led him through Yale, successful stints at Goldman Sachs and Meta, and the founding of two prior fintech companies, Parable and Lendtable (a YC S20 alum). His connection with Lerer Hippeau‚Äôs Will McKelvey, a high school acquaintance who had been following Jones‚Äôs career, proved pivotal in securing the lead investment. The seed round also saw participation from other notable investors, including Harlem Capital, Streamlined Ventures, and Westbound. This diverse backing underscores the widespread belief in Lava‚Äôs mission to simplify AI transactions. The fresh capital infusion will be strategically deployed to accelerate the company‚Äôs growth. Key areas of investment include: Hiring Talent: Expanding the team with top engineers and developers to further refine and scale the platform. Product Development: Enhancing the core Lava wallet and usage credit system, adding new features, and integrating with more foundational AI models and merchant services. Go-to-Market Strategies: Developing robust plans to onboard more merchants and users, ensuring widespread adoption of the agent-native payment system. Lava Payments is poised to become an indispensable component of the future digital economy. By addressing the fundamental challenge of payment friction for AI agents, it is paving the way for a more seamless, efficient, and truly autonomous digital experience for everyone. Lava Payments represents a crucial step forward in the evolution of digital commerce, particularly within the burgeoning AI landscape. By providing a unified, frictionless payment solution for AI agents, Lava is not just solving a technical problem; it is unlocking new possibilities for innovation and accessibility in the agent-native economy. As AI continues to integrate deeper into our daily lives, platforms like Lava will be essential in ensuring these powerful tools can operate at their full potential, without being hampered by outdated payment infrastructures. The future of AI transactions is here, and it‚Äôs powered by Lava. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI models features. This post AI Payments Breakthrough: Lava Payments Secures $5.8M for Next-Gen Digital Wallets first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team
