title: CrediX Hacker Returns $4.5M After 6-Day Heist ‚Äì Is DeFi Negotiation the New Normal?
body: The hacker behind the $4.5 million CrediX DeFi protocol exploit agreed to return stolen funds within 24 to 48 hours following successful negotiations with the protocol team. CrediX announced the agreement on social media , stating that the exploiter will receive compensation ‚Äú fully paid by the CrediX treasury ‚Äú, while affected users receive airdrops of their asset shares. We have good news for our users. Reached succesfull parley with the exploiter who agreed to return the the funds within the next 24-48 hours in return for money fully paid by the credix treasury. We have addresses of all the affected users and will airdrop them their share of‚Ä¶ ‚Äî CrediX (@CrediX_fi) August 4, 2025 Multisig Wallet Compromise Exposes Bridge Role Vulnerabilities The resolution follows a six-day compromise where attackers gained administrative control of CrediX‚Äôs multisig wallet and abused bridge privileges to mint unbacked collateral tokens on the Sonic network. The hacker used Tornado Cash-funded addresses to exploit BRIDGE role permissions, directly minting acUSDC tokens before borrowing against worthless collateral to drain approximately $2.64 million from lending pools. CrediX has joined a growing list of 2025 DeFi protocols that successfully negotiated fund returns with exploiters, including GMX‚Äôs massive $40.5 million recovery. The trend contrasts sharply with 2025‚Äôs devastating security record, showing $2.29 billion in net losses across 344 incidents during the first half. Security experts note that most hackers realize that keeping stolen cryptocurrency creates more problems than benefits due to enhanced blockchain forensics and legal risks. However, speaking with Cryptonews, Immunefi CEO Mitchell Amador warned that ‚Äú relying on a hacker‚Äôs change of heart is not a viable strategy for protocol security ,‚Äù while noting that nearly 80% of hacked projects never fully recover their value after exploits. White-Hat Negotiations Emerge as Recovery Strategy Amid Rising Exploits The CrediX recovery continues a pattern of successful negotiations between DeFi protocols and exploiters seeking legal amnesty in exchange for fund returns. GMX protocol recovered $40.5 million in July after offering a $5 million bounty to the attacker who exploited re-entrancy vulnerabilities to manipulate token pricing through flash loans. Similarly, ZKsync Association recovered $5 million in April when a hacker exploited the airdrop distribution contract‚Äôs sweepUnclaimed() function to mint 111 million unclaimed tokens. The attacker accepted a 10% bounty and returned 90% of the stolen assets within a designated 72-hour safe harbor window. KiloEx also achieved complete fund recovery in April after issuing an ultimatum to attackers who exploited price oracle vulnerabilities to manipulate ETH/USD feeds. The protocol offered 90% return terms with a 10% white-hat bounty while threatening legal pursuit and exchange collaboration to freeze associated addresses. These successful negotiations contrast with major 2025 losses, including Bybit‚Äôs $1.5 billion theft, Cetus Protocol‚Äôs initial $225 million drain, and the ongoing $234 million WazirX legal proceedings. Regarding the Cetus case, Sui validators intervened , freezing and redistributing $162 million through blockchain governance rather than hacker cooperation. CertiK data reveals that crypto investors lost $2.47 billion across 344 incidents in 2025‚Äôs first half , with wallet-related breaches accounting for $1.7 billion across just 34 attacks. Source: Certik Report Phishing scams contributed $410 million in losses through 132 separate incidents, while smart contract vulnerabilities caused $229 million in losses in May alone. Security Expert Warns Against Reactive Measures as Prevention Remains Key Mitchell Amador of Immunefi emphasized that successful fund recoveries represent exceptions rather than standard outcomes, noting that most exploited projects suffer permanent devaluation beyond initial losses. He criticized reactive security measures like post-hack bug bounties. ‚Äú Prevention always beats negotiation. Whereas reactive measures like launching a bug bounty only after a hack exacerbate the problem. ‚Äù He added, ‚Äú that not only signals weakness or lack of preparedness but also potentially creates a ‚Äòrace to the bottom‚Äô where underincentivized researchers might further exploit rather than report. ‚Äù Amador advocated for unified security stacks integrating AI-powered agents for constant vulnerability scanning and immediate threat detection rather than human-dependent monitoring systems. He warned that inadequate bug bounty rewards and slow response programs discourage legitimate security researchers while potentially turning warnings into actual attacks. Additionally, July hack losses jumped 27.2% to $142 million across seventeen major incidents , reversing June‚Äôs temporary decline. July crypto hack losses surge 27% to $142 million with CoinDCX's $44 million insider breach and GMX's $42 million exploit leading victims. #July #CryptoHack https://t.co/4UCMKaxUvI ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) August 1, 2025 Major exploits included CoinDCX‚Äôs $44.2 million insider breach and various DeFi protocol vulnerabilities affecting BigONE , WOO X , and Future Protocol platforms. Recovery efforts returned $187 million through law enforcement action, white-hat agreements, and exchange cooperation during the first half of 2025. However, net losses still totaled approximately $2.29 billion, with average incident losses reaching $7.1 million despite partial recovery successes. The post CrediX Hacker Returns $4.5M After 6-Day Heist ‚Äì Is DeFi Negotiation the New Normal? appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Babylon Introduces Trustless Bitcoin Vaults for BTC Staking Protocol
body: Bitcoin (BTC) project Babylon took another step toward offering a decentralized finance (DeFi) experience on its $5 billion staking protocol akin to that seen elsewhere in the crypto world. The latest development is the introduction of trustless vaults, designed to allow BTC holders to deposit their tokens without relying on a centralized entity, as outlined in a new white paper shared with CoinDesk on Wednesday. In DeFi ecosystems, trustless vaults are a form of digital asset storage or management that removes the need for users to trust a central authority or intermediary. Instead, the systems use smart contracts to ensure security and enforce the rules of the vault. Babylon says its vaults will allow bitcoin to be used as collateral in DeFi applications such as lending and stablecoin issuance, as well as the staking that its protocol provides. Users can also earn yield on their BTC holdings by staking it to support the operation of proof-of-stake networks. They then receive rewards paid in BABY , Babylon's native token. The development forms part of the broader movement to utilize the enormous value held in bitcoin to power DeFi activity across other blockchains. Accounting for over 60% of the total cryptocurrency market cap , bitcoin is worth comfortably more than every other digital asset combined and could prove a far more potent source of blockchain-based fuel than any other crypto in existence. Existing bridges that allow bitcoin to be deployed on external blockchains rely on centralized third parties. Furthermore, Bitcoin's scripting language does not allow for covenants ‚Äî mechanisms that allows specific conditions on how the funds can be spent in the future ‚Äî although not for a lack of trying from developers . The absence makes it harder to build trustless bridges. Babylon proposes solving this by providing on-chain vaults, with the stored BTC tied to a specific smart contract protocol on an external chain. This harnesses BitVM3 , the latest evolution of BitVM, a framework for enabling smart contracts on Bitcoin. BitVM3 is designed to improve the efficiency of its predecessor by moving the bulk of computational work off-chain using "garbled circuits," to make fraud proofs more compact on-chain. The trustless bitcoin vaults are "programmable, and withdrawals are permitted only when a zero-knowledge proof of a specific smart contract state is verified on the Bitcoin chain," Babylon said in the abstract of the paper. "Together with an appropriate Bitcoin scripting design of the vault, this eliminates the need for mutual trust among parties." title: Shiba Inu‚Äôs Shibarium Is More Than A Layer 2, Expert Reveals What It Is
body: Shiba Inu‚Äôs blockchain platform, Shibarium, is reportedly stepping beyond its original role as a Layer 2 (L2) scaling solution. In a recent announcement, the development team revealed that Shibarium is now positioned as the core infrastructure for a decentralized, community-led future, highlighting its broader functionality and long-term vision for the evolving ecosystem. Shibarium Evolves Beyond Layer 2 Solution On August 4, the Shiba Inu team behind Shibarium clarified in an X social media post that the platform is more than just a Layer 2 scaling solution. They described it as a robust infrastructure designed to power a fully decentralized, community-driven ecosystem. This positioning marks a strategic expansion of Shibarium‚Äôs role in the broader blockchain space, emphasizing its importance as a foundational layer for both innovation and governance. Related Reading: Shiba Inu Team Unveils New Developer Hub Updates ‚Äî Here‚Äôs The 411 Initially introduced as a Layer 2 built on the Ethereum blockchain to provide scalable and low-cost transactions, Shibarium‚Äôs evolution reflects a deliberate shift towards multifunctional utility. The team has outlined the platform‚Äôs capacity to support on-chain governance structures, Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs), Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), and real-world applications. This indicates Shibarium‚Äôs readiness to serve as a multi-purpose blockchain ecosystem rather than a single-purpose scaling solution. Another key component highlighted by the Shiba Inu team is Shibarium‚Äôs ability to allow developers to build freely on the network while empowering communities to govern their protocols independently. This dual emphasis on infrastructure and self-governance aligns with the core principles of decentralization, giving Shibarium the potential to become a breeding ground for next-generation blockchain applications. Compared to other Layer 2 solutions that primarily focus on throughput and transaction fees, the Shiba Inu team notes that Shibarium integrates the above features within a framework geared toward long-term sustainability and utility. In doing so, the team presents Shibarium as a dynamic platform where resilience and innovation converge to support a decentralized future. WoofSwap Proposes Major Updates For Shibarium WoofSwap, a key community voice within the Shiba Inu ecosystem, released a set of reform proposals on X, aimed at enhancing Shibarium‚Äôs scalability, utility, and overall appeal. At the center of the suggestions is a potential revision to the 20 million BONE token allocation, with WoofSwap urging community input to fine-tune the distribution. Related Reading: Shiba Inu Bearish Reversal Setup Says Dump Below $0.000013 Is Coming Alongside tokenomics adjustments, the proposal targets technical improvements such as optimizing cross-chain speed to achieve a near one-minute transaction finality, positioning Shibarium as a faster and more competitive Layer 2 network. Other key technical refinements include streamlining smart contracts to lower Ethereum gas fees and expanding support for trendline cross-chain tokens. Beyond infrastructure, the proposal addresses governance and engagement for Shibarium. Decentralization also remains a priority, with a call to gradually open validator nodes while maintaining strict security standards. WoofSwap also urged influencers to be more cautious with their public roles, highlighting the need for credibility as Shibarium evolves. Featured image from Getty Images, chart from Tradingview.com

title: France Moves To Mine Bitcoin With Nuclear Power ‚Äî Here‚Äôs What We Know
body: France is moving into a new phase of cryptocurrency adoption, as the country‚Äôs far-right political party, Rassemblement National (RN), is reportedly drafting a new law that would allow unused nuclear power to fuel Bitcoin mining operations. According to French newspaper Le Monde, party leader and three-time presidential candidate Marine Le Pen promoted the plan during a visit to the Flamanville nuclear plant on March 11, calling it a smart way to turn wasted electricity into ‚Äúsecure and extremely profitable‚Äù digital assets. France Pushes New Plan To Mine Bitcoin With Nuclear Energy Rassemblement National‚Äôs proposal is now one of the most talked-about crypto developments in France . The party argues that since France often produces more electricity than it can use, the extra power shouldn‚Äôt go to waste. Leading the charge is RN lawmaker Aur√©lien Lopez-Liguori. He has drafted a bill to install Bitcoin mining equipment at nuclear sites run by √âlectricit√© de France (EDF), the country‚Äôs state-owned power company. The proposal aims to redirect the country‚Äôs unused nuclear energy, up to one gigawatt of surplus energy from these plants, straight into Bitcoin mining facilities. Since France generates over 70% of its electricity from nuclear energy, when supply exceeds demand, energy companies sell the extra electricity at a loss or even pay neighboring countries to take it off their hands. Instead of selling the extra power at a loss, France would use it for something more valuable: mine Bitcoin and keep the profits. The bill, submitted to the French National Assembly on July 11, 2025, includes a five-year pilot program that will allow power producers to set up mining operations right at nuclear plants with internal projections that could bring in between $100 million and $150 million each year. A Political Turnaround: From Crypto Skeptics To Advocates The Rassemblement National‚Äôs push for Bitcoin mining marks a dramatic shift in the party‚Äôs stance on cryptocurrency. In 2016, Marine Le Pen was strongly against crypto, warning that it would strip citizens of their financial control and give more power to global banks, calling for a complete ban on its use in France. However, by 2022, Le Pen had begun to soften her tone, showing support for regulated crypto use in finance. Now in 2025 , she‚Äôs openly backing Bitcoin mining as part of a national strategy, which reflects how far both her party and the broader political conversation have evolved on crypto. After a similar proposal failed in June 2025, Lawmaker Lopez-Liguori reworked the draft to focus more on national infrastructure and economic recovery, claiming the plan would help make France more economically independent while solving a long-standing energy problem. If passed , France would become the first country in Europe to officially link state-backed Bitcoin mining with nuclear energy, setting an example for other nations looking to monetize excess renewable or nuclear power.

title: Trader Sees 1,300x Returns As Solana Memecoin Goes on Explosive Rally: Lookonchain
body: One trader is seeing million dollar profits on a Solana ( SOL )-based memecoin in just months, according to on-chain data. Blockchain tracking firm Lookonchain says that one investor in TROLL is looking at a gain of more than 130,000% after the memecoin inspired by the internet trolling culture had an explosive rally over the last month. ‚ÄúFrom $2,900 to $3.78 million in just 3.5 months ‚Äì a 1,300x return! Trader ‚Äòfrostx.sol‚Äô spent $2,900 to buy 20.91 million TROLL three months ago, sold 2.55 million for $50,700 and still holds 18.36 million TROLL ($3.73 million). With TROLL‚Äôs recent surge, his position has flipped nearly 1,300x, with a profit of $3.78 million.‚Äù Source: Lookonchain/X TROLL hit an all-time high on Wednesday at $0.2018, an increase of more than 423% from its seven-day low of $0.0403. TROLL has since retraced from its ATH and is trading for $0.1669 at time of writing, up 15.2% on the day. With a market cap of $175 million, TROLL is the 344th largest crypto project. Meanwhile, Solana, which has gained network activity from the memecoin craze, may be losing investor interest, according to crypto analytics platform Glassnode. Glassnode says that one key metric suggests that Ethereum ( ETH ) may be suddenly attracting more investors at the expense of Solana. The firm uses the Hot Realized Cap metric, which measures the capital held by accounts that have been active in the last seven days, to track the capital inflow of new investors. ‚ÄúThe SOL/ETH hot capital ratio is in a clear downtrend, now at its YTD low of 0.045. ETH saw record short-term inflows on July 29th, while SOL hit a local peak ‚Äì but both are now decelerating. The cooldown is sharper for SOL, signaling a fading but notable ETH-led rotation.‚Äù Source: Glassnode/X ETH is trading for $3,649 at time of writing, up 1.7% in the last 24 hours. Meanwhile, SOL is trading for $167 at time of writing, up 2.6% on the day. title: Analyst Predicts Timeline for XRP New All-Time High
body: Excitement is reaching a fever pitch in the XRP community as technical indicators and market momentum align for what many believe could be a historic breakout. According to Levi of Crypto Crusaders, XRP is preparing to challenge, and potentially surpass, its all-time high , with a major price move expected within the next two days. His analysis, supported by clear historical patterns and strengthening fundamentals, is igniting fresh optimism across the market. Technical Indicators Signal Imminent Surge Levi‚Äôs assessment centers on XRP‚Äôs current technical posture. The token is presently oversold, a condition that often precedes a sharp upward reversal. At the same time, he notes the emergence of positive momentum, suggesting that XRP may be poised to transition from consolidation into a full-scale rally. TWO DAYS LEFT!!! Until you know how #XRP Breaks All-Time High #XRP pic.twitter.com/78UnwkZzey ‚Äî Levi | Crypto Crusaders (@LeviRietveld) August 5, 2025 To support this outlook, Levi draws a comparison to XRP‚Äôs behavior on June 23, when the asset was similarly oversold. In the weeks that followed, XRP surged from $1.90 to $3.66, nearly doubling in price. That rally saw a swift transition from a market low to an overbought condition in under a month. The resemblance between these past and present setups is fueling speculation that XRP may be about to repeat that explosive performance. XRP ETFs Could Accelerate Institutional Inflows In addition to the bullish technical signals, the potential introduction of XRP exchange-traded funds (ETFs) adds another powerful catalyst. Levi highlights the growing anticipation surrounding ETF approvals, which could bring a wave of institutional capital into XRP, much like the impact Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs have had on their respective markets. The improved regulatory clarity following potential resolution of Ripple‚Äôs legal battle against the U.S. SEC has made XRP far more appealing to institutional investors. ETFs would provide regulated and convenient exposure to XRP, removing barriers that previously kept large players on the sidelines. If approved, these products could help sustain price appreciation and provide greater liquidity across the board. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 XRP Builds Strength Ahead of Potential Breakout Market conditions continue to support Levi‚Äôs outlook. As of report time, XRP is trading around $2.97. Volume is increasing, volatility is returning, and open interest in derivatives markets suggests growing speculative interest. These factors, combined with the oversold readings and rising momentum, indicate that XRP may be entering a breakout phase. Levi‚Äôs bold call for a major move within two days has captured attention throughout the crypto space. Many analysts and traders are closely monitoring price action, looking for confirmation that XRP is indeed repeating its previous pattern of rapid gains following a technical bottom. What Comes Next for XRP? As the countdown begins, the market is bracing for a potential turning point. If XRP follows the path outlined by Levi of Crypto Crusaders, the token could soon challenge its all-time high of $3.84 ‚Äîand potentially move beyond it for the first time in history. Whether the breakout unfolds in the exact timeframe predicted or not, the conditions are undeniably aligning. With strong technical signals, rising institutional interest, and bullish sentiment, XRP may be on the verge of a defining moment in its price history. title: Trump‚Äôs tariffs threaten U.S. Bitcoin mining momentum
body: Trump‚Äôs tariffs could spell trouble for the Bitcoin mining industry and derail plans to turn the U.S. into a mining hub, as U.S. mining firms are scrambling to adapt to rising costs and disrupted supply chains. The U.S. bitcoin mining industry is bracing for significant turbulence as President Trump‚Äôs administration has imposed a wave of steep reciprocal import tariffs on mining hardware from key Southeast Asian markets. The new measures, which were finalized on July 31, target countries that are central to the global supply chain for ASICs and could derail the president‚Äôs efforts to turn the U.S. into a global mining hub. Trump‚Äôs tariffs threaten U.S. Bitcoin mining momentum The tariffs, effective August 7, impose a 19% reciprocal duty on mining rigs imported from Indonesia, Malaysia, and Thailand, resulting in a total levy of 21.6%. The imposition follows the expiration of the 90-day tariff pause announced in April under Trump‚Äôs ‚Äú Liberation Day ‚Äù trade reset. While these rates are lower than earlier proposals of up to 50%, they represent a steep increase from the pre-Trump standard U.S. import duty of 2.6%. According to Ethan Vera , the COO of the Bitcoin mining infrastructure firm, Luxor Technology, the new tariffs are already reducing the demand from U.S.-based miners. ‚ÄúAt 21.6% tariffs, the U.S. is now one of the least competitive jurisdictions to bring machines in,‚Äù according to Vera. He added that mining companies are increasingly looking to Canada and other countries with more favorable import regimes. U.S. tariffs on China remain unchanged for now. A 10% reciprocal tariff remains in place through August 12, as well as a 20% premium specifically for China, totaling 57.6% on imports. This rate is well below the initially proposed 145%. Back in May, Vera warned that the U.S. could lose its edge as a top mining destination if tariffs are fully applied across the sector‚Äôs global supply chain. ‚ÄúRussia is likely to be the main beneficiary,‚Äù he noted, citing the country‚Äôs access to cheaper hardware and the growing Chinese capital investment. Other markets such as Canada, Northern Europe, Brazil, and Paraguay are also expected to attract fresh mining capital fleeing the U.S. In response, Luxor continues to advocate for Bitcoin mining ASICs to receive special tariff exemptions, similar to those granted to imports under HTSUS 8471, which covers computers, laptops, and servers. Vera emphasized that such treatment would be in line with the Trump administration‚Äôs campaign pledge to support domestic bitcoin mining. U.S. miners are exploring onshore partnerships Luxor Technology is helping its clients to secure equipment through new onshore partnerships, including a domestic production deal with Chinese rig manufacturer MicroBT. Vera noted that major ASIC producers are actively working to expand U.S.-based manufacturing to offer cost-effective solutions for American miners. However, these efforts won‚Äôt be enough to plug the immediate gap. ‚ÄúFinal assembly in the U.S. is possible today,‚Äù Vera said, ‚Äúbut the raw materials and components largely come from Asia.‚Äù As a result, even U.S.-assembled machines carry higher costs. He estimates it could take years before a fully domesticated ASIC supply chain is realized. In the short term, Vera expects these machines to appreciate by more than 20% as import tariffs will drive demand for locally available alternatives. BitFuFu‚Äôs CEO Leo Lu told The Block that U.S.-based miners can still maintain competitive margins thanks to low-cost, increasingly renewable energy in states like Oklahoma, Texas, and Colorado. BitFuFu says it is building out local partnerships to mitigate the impact of tariffs while expanding its U.S. presence. As the global hashpower landscape begins to shift and machine flows reroute to more favorable jurisdictions, the U.S. Bitcoin mining sector could face a prolonged period of stagnation ‚Äî unless further policy accommodations are made. title: Ethereum Treasury Firms: Unlocking Superior Returns Over ETH ETFs, Says Standard Chartered
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum Treasury Firms: Unlocking Superior Returns Over ETH ETFs, Says Standard Chartered The cryptocurrency landscape is constantly evolving, presenting new avenues for investors. Recently, a significant shift in perspective has emerged from a major financial institution. Standard Chartered, a global banking giant, is signaling a clear preference for Ethereum treasury firms over traditional ETH ETFs for investors seeking optimal returns. This insight comes directly from Geoffrey Kendrick, Standard Chartered‚Äôs Head of FX and Digital Assets Research, and it‚Äôs sparking considerable discussion in the crypto community. This isn‚Äôt just a fleeting observation. Kendrick highlights that these specialized firms are becoming ‚Äúvery investable,‚Äù holding a substantial 1.6% of the total ETH supply. This figure remarkably matches the collective holdings of U.S. spot ETH ETFs . So, what makes these firms stand out in the competitive world of crypto investment strategies ? Why Are Ethereum Treasury Firms Gaining Traction? The core of Standard Chartered‚Äôs endorsement lies in the inherent advantages offered by Ethereum treasury firms . Unlike their ETF counterparts, these firms provide access to crucial functionalities within the Ethereum ecosystem. This difference creates a significant disparity in potential upside for investors. NAV Multiples Above 1: These firms often trade at a premium, indicating strong market confidence and perceived value beyond their underlying assets. Access to Staking Benefits: A key differentiator is the ability to participate in Ethereum‚Äôs staking mechanism. This allows firms to earn additional yield on their ETH holdings, compounding returns for investors. DeFi Opportunities: Beyond staking, these firms can also engage with various decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols, potentially unlocking further growth and utility for their assets. This active participation in the Ethereum network provides a dynamic edge that passive investment vehicles simply cannot replicate. For those exploring new crypto investment strategies , this flexibility is a powerful draw. Unlocking Superior Returns: ETH ETFs vs. Treasury Firms When comparing ETH ETFs with Ethereum treasury firms , the contrast becomes clear. While ETFs offer straightforward exposure to Ethereum‚Äôs price, their structure limits participation in core network activities. This limitation impacts their ability to generate additional revenue streams. ETFs, by design, typically cannot stake their underlying ETH. This means investors in these products miss out on the passive income generated from securing the Ethereum network. In contrast, Ethereum treasury firms actively leverage staking to enhance their returns, creating a more compelling value proposition. Geoffrey Kendrick‚Äôs analysis for Standard Chartered crypto research underscores this critical distinction, pointing to a higher potential upside for the treasury firm model. This fundamental difference positions treasury firms as potentially more lucrative for investors seeking to maximize their Ethereum exposure. It‚Äôs about not just holding the asset, but actively growing it within the ecosystem. Strategic Crypto Investment Strategies: Leading the Way The trend towards Ethereum treasury firms is already gaining momentum, with several entities leading the charge. The Block reported that firms like BitMine and SharpLink are at the forefront of this movement. These companies are actively growing their Ethereum treasury firms holdings, demonstrating a tangible commitment to this investment approach. Their success serves as a practical example of how these innovative crypto investment strategies are being implemented in the market. As more investors become aware of the substantial staking benefits and DeFi opportunities, the expectation is that these firms will continue to expand their ETH portfolios. This growth could further solidify their position as preferred vehicles for institutional and sophisticated investors looking for more than just passive exposure. The evolving landscape demands a nuanced approach, and Standard Chartered crypto insights suggest that the future of institutional Ethereum investment might very well lie with these dynamic treasury operations. In summary, Standard Chartered‚Äôs Geoffrey Kendrick has presented a compelling argument for prioritizing Ethereum treasury firms over traditional ETH ETFs . The ability of these firms to engage in staking and DeFi activities, coupled with their strong NAV multiples, positions them for superior returns. As the crypto market matures, understanding these nuanced differences in crypto investment strategies will be crucial for making informed decisions. The trend is clear: active participation in the Ethereum ecosystem through treasury firms offers distinct advantages for growth and yield, making them a highly attractive option for the savvy investor. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: How do Ethereum treasury firms differ from ETH ETFs? A1: Ethereum treasury firms actively manage their ETH holdings, often participating in staking and DeFi protocols to generate additional returns. In contrast, ETH ETFs typically hold ETH passively, offering price exposure without the ability to earn yield from network activities like staking. Q2: What are the main benefits of investing in Ethereum treasury firms? A2: Key benefits include access to staking benefits , potential participation in DeFi, and often trading at NAV multiples above 1, indicating strong market confidence and potential for superior returns compared to passive ETF investments. Q3: Why does Standard Chartered favor these firms? A3: Standard Chartered crypto research, led by Geoffrey Kendrick, favors these firms due to their active management capabilities, ability to earn yield through staking, and overall higher potential for upside compared to the more limited structure of traditional ETH ETFs . Q4: Can individual investors access Ethereum treasury firms? A4: While some Ethereum treasury firms might be geared towards institutional or accredited investors, the increasing interest in these crypto investment strategies may lead to more accessible avenues for individual investors in the future. It is advisable to research specific firms and their investment requirements. Q5: What are staking benefits? A5: Staking benefits refer to the rewards earned by locking up cryptocurrency, such as Ethereum, to support the operations and security of a blockchain network. This process helps validate transactions and create new blocks, and in return, stakers receive new tokens as yield, similar to earning interest on a savings account. If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Help others understand the evolving landscape of Ethereum investments and the potential advantages of Ethereum treasury firms . Your shares help us continue providing valuable crypto insights. To learn more about the latest Ethereum trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption . This post Ethereum Treasury Firms: Unlocking Superior Returns Over ETH ETFs, Says Standard Chartered first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs Lose $196M While Ethereum Funds Gain Inflows
body: Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC lost $99.1M; BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT lost $77.4M, but remains AUM leader at $83.8B. Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC saw $19.7M leave; since launch, its outflows total over $23.7B. ETH-based ETFs gained $73.2M net. BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA led with $88.8M inflow, AUM now $9.46B. On August 5, 2025, the spot Bitcoin ETF sector recorded capital outflows totaling $196.2 million, according to SoSoValue. The largest outflow came from Fidelity Investments‚Äô FBTC fund, which lost $99.1 million. BlackRock‚Äôs spot Bitcoin ETF (IBIT) saw the second-largest outflow, losing $77.4 million. Despite this, IBIT remains the sector leader in assets under management (AUM) at $83.8 billion. Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC ranked third, with $19.7 million withdrawn in the past 24 hours. Since inception, GBTC has experienced cumulative outflows exceeding $23.7 billion. The remaining nine spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded no changes in fund flows during the most recent trading day. In the Ethereum spot ETF sector, net capital inflow on August 5 was $73.2 million. BlackRock‚Äôs ETF (ETHA) led with $88.8 million in inflows and now has $9.46 billion in AUM. VanEck and 21Shares spot Ethereum ETFs added $5.2 million and $3.6 million, respectively. Grayscale‚Äôs ETFs, ETH and ETHE, posted outflows of $13.5 million and $10.9 million, respectively. Four other spot Ethereum ETFs recorded no net flows for the day. The divergent capital flows reflect varying investor sentiment between Bitcoin and Ethereum. While Bitcoin ETFs faced significant redemptions, Ethereum-based products attracted fresh capital, signaling optimism about Ethereum's upcoming network upgrades and potential use cases. This contrast highlights the evolving dynamics in crypto asset preferences among institutional and retail investors amid fluctuating market conditions.

title: Bybit‚Äôs Ben Zhou Charts Bold New Course to Rewrite Crypto Success at Mid-Year Keynote
body: BitcoinWorld Bybit‚Äôs Ben Zhou Charts Bold New Course to Rewrite Crypto Success at Mid-Year Keynote DUBAI , UAE , Aug. 7, 2025 /PRNewswire/ ‚Äî Bybit , the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, has unveiled its bold roadmap for the future of crypto, setting the tone for a new era of innovation, security, and trading excellence. In the highly anticipated ‚Äú Keynote with Ben: Reshaping What‚Äôs Next, Bit by Bit ,‚Äù CEO and Co-founder Ben Zhou delivered a forward-looking vision grounded in real-world adoption, institutional-grade innovation, and deep ecosystem alignment. Celebrating over six years of service, 74 million users, and a milestone where 1 in 8 crypto enthusiasts globally have chosen Bybit, CEO and Co-founder Ben Zhou reaffirmed the exchange‚Äôs mission: Rewrite Your Success. Reshape The Standard. ‚ÄúCrypto is no longer just about speculation ‚Äî it‚Äôs about real world application. At Bybit, we‚Äôre not just trading the future; we‚Äôre rewriting and reshaping what success looks like, bit by bit,‚Äù said Zhou. Compliance as a Foundation for the Future Bybit opened the keynote with a reaffirmation of its compliance-first approach ‚Äî a critical pillar as the industry matures. Now fully compliant with the EU‚Äôs Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCAR) framework and securing FIU-India registration in the first half of 2025, Bybit emphasized compliance not as a barrier but as an enabler. Zhou emphasized that ‚Äúsustainability in crypto begins with trust and transparency,‚Äù and positioned compliance not as a constraint, but as a catalyst for long-term growth. Rewriting the Industry Security Standard Bybit has also successfully rewritten the industry standard for security following a sophisticated multi-stage attack on one of its vendors in February ‚Äî the largest known hack in crypto history. While Bybit‚Äôs own infrastructure remained uncompromised, the company acted swiftly in response. Within weeks, it completed nine extensive security audits ‚Äî conducted by both internal and independent experts ‚Äî and implemented over 50 enhanced safeguards. The response drew industry-wide praise and global recognition for its transparency, resilience, and user-first approach. Today, Bybit‚Äôs security overhaul is regarded as a new benchmark in platform integrity. Trading Excellence Backed by Infrastructure Upgrades Bybit continues to lead in performance and reliability. Its upgraded matching engine now handles 3.5 million transactions per second, processing nearly 200 billion daily orders ‚Äî a 75% year-over-year increase in the first half of 2025. By extending its Rapid Price Improvement (RPI) mechanism to perpetual contracts, Bybit has delivered 150% higher liquidity and up to 5x better execution across retail and VIP accounts, firmly establishing itself as the go-to destination for professional trading. Setting a New Height in Crypto Wealth Management As institutional and high-net-worth adoption increases, Bybit is reshaping what wealth preservation means in the digital age. Its newly launched wealth management platform has already surpassed $150 million in AUM, offering curated portfolios and strategic services tailored to sophisticated investors ‚Äî all underpinned by Bybit‚Äôs trading depth and robust security infrastructure. Redefining Real-World Utility: Bybit Card and Payments Another highlight was the new edition of the Bybit Card ‚Äî now positioned as a crypto-native business card that integrates seamlessly into both corporate and consumer spending. With support for Visa and Mastercard networks, smart security features, and real-time expense tracking, the card bridges the gap between digital assets and daily transactions. Bybit Card is expected to expand into the EU region in August, with Peru and Colombia lined up for Q4. Bybit‚Äôs payments infrastructure has also made major strides. Native support for nationwide QR payments in Southeast Asia and LATAM has driven a 719% quarter-over-quarter increase in usage. With over two million users and cross-sector partnerships with local services like Rappi and Vivaticket, Bybit is moving closer to making crypto as usable as ‚Äúcash‚Äù. Introducing Bybit Lite to Earn, Manage, and Trade Zhou unveiled the upgraded Bybit App ‚Äî a unified platform that streamlines both active trading and passive income generation. Bybit Lite is a new upgraded version for casual users and a reimagined Earn section, offering personalized strategies and simplified ways to activate idle capital. A Key Partner of Mantle 2.0 A major announcement was Bybit‚Äôs deepened strategic alignment with Mantle This partnership sets the stage for what Zhou called ‚Äúa bold new chapter in institutional-grade on-chain finance.‚Äù The launch of Mantle 2.0 comes with renewed leadership and tighter ecosystem integration ‚Äî including Helen Liu , Co-CEO and Partner of Bybit and Emily Bao , Head of Spot and Web3 at Bybit stepping in as key advisors. Together, Bybit, as one of Mantle‚Äôs ecosystem partners, will accelerate the development of decentralized finance by aligning infrastructure, liquidity, and governance. The collaboration aims to set new standards for scalability and compliance, while tapping into the growing demand for trust-driven DeFi solutions. Reshaping the Standard With this keynote, Bybit signaled more than just platform growth ‚Äî it marked a shift in how the industry defines success. Zhou‚Äôs message was clear: The next era of crypto will be shaped by platforms that offer trust, usability, and true innovation. ‚ÄúWe believe crypto should be usable, secure, and powerful enough to serve everyone ‚Äî from first-time users to institutional investors,‚Äù Zhou said. ‚ÄúTogether with our community, we are rewriting the rules and reshaping the space for good.‚Äù Watch the full keynote replay here . #Bybit / #TheCryptoArk About Bybit Bybit is the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, serving a global community of over 70 million users. Founded in 2018, Bybit is redefining openness in the decentralized world by creating a simpler, open and equal ecosystem for everyone. With a strong focus on Web3, Bybit partners strategically with leading blockchain protocols to provide robust infrastructure and drive on-chain innovation. Renowned for its secure custody, diverse marketplaces, intuitive user experience, and advanced blockchain tools, Bybit bridges the gap between TradFi and DeFi, empowering builders, creators, and enthusiasts to unlock the full potential of Web3. Discover the future of decentralized finance at Bybit.com . For more details about Bybit, please visit Bybit Press For media inquiries, please contact: media@bybit.com For updates, please follow: Bybit‚Äôs Communities and Social Media Discord | Facebook | Instagram | LinkedIn | Reddit | Telegram | TikTok | X | Youtube This post Bybit‚Äôs Ben Zhou Charts Bold New Course to Rewrite Crypto Success at Mid-Year Keynote first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by chainwire

title: Details About Ripple-South Korea Partnership Revealed ‚Äì Ripple Asia President Makes Statement
body: Ripple (XRP) adoption is gaining momentum in South Korea. The country‚Äôs digital asset custodian, BDACS, recently announced the launch of an institutional-grade custody service for Ripple (XRP). This step is considered the first concrete result of the strategic partnership established with Ripple in February. BDACS stated on Twitter that XRP is one of the most traded digital assets in South Korea. The new custody service provides access to XRP to large institutional investors in a regulated environment. The infrastructure will be provided by Ripple's institutional custody solution, Ripple Custody. This solution is optimized not only for XRP but also for Ripple's stablecoin, RLUSD. To increase institutional access, BDACS has completed integrations with Upbit, Coinone, and Korbit, three major cryptocurrency exchanges in the country. This development aligns with the South Korean Financial Services Commission's policy to promote the digital asset market. BDACS officials stated, ‚ÄúWe will support the growth of not only custody but also tokenization and stablecoin use cases within the XRP Ledger ecosystem.‚Äù Related News: Nasdaq-Listed Company Reveals Surprise Altcoin Ownership - The Only Company Investing in This Altcoin According to market research, the global digital asset storage market could exceed $16 trillion by 2030. It is estimated that tokenized assets could account for 10% of global GDP. Fiona Murray, Ripple Asia-Pacific President, highlighted the importance of this partnership, saying, ‚ÄúWhile the regulatory environment is changing rapidly, institutional demand is also increasing at the same pace.‚Äù BDACS CEO Yoo Hae-ri said in a statement, ‚ÄúTogether with Ripple's blockchain infrastructure, we will provide a secure and reliable storage environment. Together with Ripple, we will lead the growth of the digital asset industry.‚Äù BDACS is already actively involved in the Busan Blockchain Free Zone and is developing partnerships with projects like Avalanche (AVAX) and Polymesh. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Details About Ripple-South Korea Partnership Revealed ‚Äì Ripple Asia President Makes Statement

title: XRPL Validator Sends Critical Warning to XRP Holders. Here‚Äôs Why
body: A trusted voice in the XRP Ledger community has raised the alarm over growing security risks tied to a new cross-chain airdrop. In a post shared on X, XRPL validator Vet issued a critical warning to XRP holders participating in the Midnight airdrop , a project emerging from the Cardano ecosystem. According to Vet, users must exercise extreme caution, interact only with official websites, never share their XRP account keys, and avoid downloading any third-party software. Midnight Airdrop Draws Interest‚ÄîAnd Scammers The Midnight airdrop , which distributes NIGHT tokens to holders of multiple major assets including XRP, ADA, BTC, and ETH, is gaining rapid attention. Designed by Cardano‚Äôs Midnight sidechain, this airdrop allows eligible users‚Äîthose who held at least $100 worth of XRP during a snapshot in June‚Äîto claim NIGHT tokens through a portal hosted at claim.midnight.gd. The claim process is currently facilitated through the Xaman Wallet, previously known as Xumm. Careful collecting the Midnight airdrop for XRP holders coming from the Cardano/Charles community. Only interact with the official site, don't share your XRP account keys, don't download any software! Stay extremely vigilant. ‚Äî Vet (@Vet_X0) August 5, 2025 However, this spike in visibility has also drawn malicious actors. Fake websites, phishing links, and impersonated support agents have begun circulating widely. Vet‚Äôs post highlights these threats, warning XRP users not to fall victim to unofficial channels or deceptive prompts. The validator emphasized that the only safe route is through the project‚Äôs verified resources. The Rising Risk of Exploits As enthusiasm around XRP‚Äôs growing ecosystem intensifies‚Äîfueled by tokenization advancements, sidechain integration , and the EVM compatibility ‚Äîscammers are capitalizing on FOMO (fear of missing out). Vet notes that these exploitative schemes often surge during major events, particularly airdrops, when users may act impulsively without verifying details. Phishing campaigns typically mimic the appearance of trusted platforms to trick users into entering private keys or downloading malicious software. Once compromised, wallets are emptied instantly. Vet‚Äôs proactive warning is therefore a vital intervention, urging users to slow down and double-check every step. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Verified Claim Process: What to Know Those eligible for the airdrop are advised to use only the official claim portal at claim.midnight.gd . Access should be made directly‚Äînever through third-party links shared on social media or messaging platforms. The Xaman Wallet app should be used in its latest, unmodified version, and users must be especially careful never to input their seed phrases outside the app‚Äôs official environment. Importantly, support for the airdrop will only be offered through the in-app helpdesk, not on Telegram, Discord, or unofficial X accounts. A Timely Reminder for the XRP Community Vet‚Äôs message comes at a pivotal time. As the XRP Ledger gains momentum and cross-chain interoperability becomes more common, ensuring user security is paramount. The Midnight airdrop represents a significant opportunity‚Äîbut only if approached with care. This warning serves not to create fear but to foster awareness. With proper caution and a commitment to safety-first practices, XRP holders can benefit from the expanding utility of the ecosystem without falling prey to avoidable traps. In crypto, opportunity and risk often walk hand in hand. Vet‚Äôs call for vigilance is a powerful reminder that trust begins with protection. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on Twitter , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post XRPL Validator Sends Critical Warning to XRP Holders. Here‚Äôs Why appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: ChatGPT‚Äôs XRP Analysis: SEC Vote Looms, Will $214B ETF Ignite a Record-Breaking Rally?
body: ChatGPT‚Äôs XRP analysis indicates consolidation strength at $2.98, marked by +0.78% gains, following Japan‚Äôs SBI Holdings filing for a $214 billion Bitcoin-XRP ETF. Trading above key 50-day , 100-day , and 200-day EMAs, with only the 20-day EMA at $3.02 providing minor resistance, XRP demonstrates a resilient bullish structure with a strong institutional foundation. ChatGPT‚Äôs XRP analysis synthesizes 20 real-time technical indicators, Japanese ETF developments, the SEC decision timeline, and the Korean institutional custody launch to assess XRP‚Äôs 90-day trajectory amid key regulatory inflection between consolidation continuation and explosive breakout momentum. Technical Analysis: Healthy Consolidation Above Key EMAs XRP‚Äôs current price of $2.98 reflects a steady +0.78% daily gain from the opening price of $2.96 , establishing a tight trading range between $2.99 (high) and $2.90 (low). This controlled 2.9% intraday range demonstrates institutional accumulation typical of pre-breakout consolidation phases. Source: TradingView The RSI at 50.61 sits in perfect neutral territory with substantial room for upward movement without overbought conditions. Moving averages reveal strong positioning with XRP above most major EMAs: 50-day at $2.81 ( -5.9% ), 100-day at $2.60 ( -12.9% ), and 200-day at $2.35 ( -21.1% ), with only the 20-day EMA at $3.02 ( +1.0% ) providing resistance. This structure indicates healthy consolidation within an uptrend. Source: TradingView MACD shows mixed signs at -0.0557 below zero, but a positive histogram at 0.1023 suggests building momentum toward a potential bullish crossover. Volume analysis shows exceptional activity at 79.32 million XRP during consolidation, indicating sustained institutional interest. ATR at 2.20 suggests a high volatility environment with potential for strong moves as regulatory catalysts approach. Historical Context: Steady Recovery Following Summer Volatility XRP‚Äôs August performance demonstrates resilience with current consolidation building on July‚Äôs explosive rally to $3.10 despite broader market uncertainty. The steady positioning above $2.90 validates institutional confidence in regulatory resolution. January‚Äôs $3.40 start, followed by a spring correction to February‚Äôs $1.177 and extended consolidation through June at $2.18-$2.21, established a strong accumulation base. July‚Äôs breakthrough to $3.10 confirmed the resumption of the bullish structure. Source: TradingView August‚Äôs current consolidation between $2.70-$3.00 represents healthy digestion of July gains while maintaining elevation above historical resistance zones. Current pricing maintains a 23.25% discount to the all-time high while securing extraordinary 106,000%+ gains from 2014 lows, showing both remaining upside potential and proven capacity for institutional-grade appreciation through regulatory cycles. Support & Resistance: Strong Foundation Below Current Levels Immediate support emerges at today‚Äôs low around $2.90 , reinforced by psychological support and proximity to the 50-day EMA at $2.81 . This confluence provides primary defense with substantial EMA support layers below. Source: TradingView Resistance begins at the 20-day EMA around $3.02 , followed by the July high at $3.10 and major resistance at $3.20-$3.40 . Breaking above $3.02 could trigger momentum acceleration toward these higher targets. The technical setup suggests minimal downside risk with strong EMA support, while upside breakout above $3.02 could trigger rapid appreciation toward $3.20-$3.40 based on ETF momentum and regulatory clarity. SBI Holdings ETF: $214B Giant Enters XRP Market Japan‚Äôs SBI Holdings, managing $214 billion in assets, filed for a Bitcoin-XRP ETF launch , representing massive institutional validation for XRP‚Äôs payment infrastructure. @SBIHoldings has launched the Crypto Asset ETF and Digital Gold Crypto ETF, bringing dual Bitcoin-XRP and Bitcoin-gold exposure to the Tokyo Stock Exchange. #ETF #Japan https://t.co/jVXxTzO0J6 ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) August 6, 2025 The ETF filing demonstrates growing institutional recognition of XRP‚Äôs utility beyond speculative trading. The latest development follows a growing trend we‚Äôve seen in 2025 . JUST IN: GALAXY $GLXY OWNS $15 MILLION IN $XRP ! pic.twitter.com/YdPz6K55V9 ‚Äî Good Morning Crypto (@AbsGMCrypto) August 5, 2025 ‚ÄúCompanies are increasingly diversifying across [alternative cryptocurrencies], treating them as strategic assets aligned with the evolving structure of digital finance,‚Äù Shawn Young, Chief Analyst at MEXC Research, noted. He shared with Cryptonews, asserting that ‚Äúthe current crypto bull cycle is not over, but it‚Äôs in a phase where macro uncertainty is seriously weighing in and muting market momentum.‚Äù ChatGPT‚Äôs XRP Analysis: SEC Decision Timeline Accelerates ChatGPT‚Äôs XRP analysis reveals key regulatory momentum with the SEC vote scheduled for August 7, potentially finalizing the appeal decision before the August 15 deadline. BREEEEEEEEAAKING #SEC VOTE ON #RIPPLE LAWSUIT SET FOR AUGUST 7 DECISION TO DROP THE APPEAL COULD LAND BEFORE AUGUST 15 IF CONFIRMED, THIS WOULD LOCK IN $XRP NON SECURITY STATUS pic.twitter.com/7XsseNANn4 ‚Äî XRP Update (@XrpUdate) August 6, 2025 SEC decision timeline acceleration suggests internal pressure for resolution, favoring optimistic outcome scenarios. Market Fundamentals: Stable Metrics Amid Consolidation XRP maintains the third-largest cryptocurrency position with $176.96 billion market cap, demonstrating institutional stability during market uncertainty. The modest 0.06% market cap increase accompanies an 11.69% volume decline to $5.05 billion . Source: CoinMarketCap Circulating supply of 59.3 billion XRP represents 59.3% of the maximum 100 billion token supply, with controlled release supporting stability. Market dominance of 4.71% positions XRP as a major institutional cryptocurrency with substantial ecosystem recognition. Social Sentiment: Building Momentum Despite Consolidation LunarCrush data reveals improving social performance with XRP‚Äôs AltRank advancing to 405 , indicating renewed community engagement. Galaxy Score of 55 reflects building positive sentiment around ETF developments and the SEC decision timeline. Engagement metrics show substantial activity with 9.96 million total engagements and 54.98K mentions ( +22.02K ). Social dominance of 3.8% demonstrates sustained attention during the consolidation phase. Sentiment registers at a robust 83% positive, reflecting community optimism around SBI ETF filing, SEC vote, and Korean custody launch. $XRP repeating 2017 if so we are in the final week before pic.twitter.com/dKAyVtECKu ‚Äî papa (@mamagucci) August 5, 2025 Recent themes focus on bull flag patterns, $7-14 price targets, and institutional adoption acceleration. Three-Month XRP Price Forecast Scenarios Regulatory Clarity Breakout (50% Probability) SEC appeal resolution combined with SBI ETF approval could drive explosive appreciation toward $7.00-$10.00 , representing 135-235% upside from current levels. Source: TradingView This scenario requires sustained volume above 100 million daily and a successful break above $3.42 resistance. Extended Consolidation (30% Probability) Delayed regulatory decisions could result in range-bound action between $2.70-$3.20 , allowing technical indicators to reset while institutional positioning continues. Source: TradingView Support at EMA levels would provide accumulation opportunities. Correction on Regulatory Setbacks (20% Probability) Unexpected regulatory delays could trigger selling toward $2.60-$2.80 support levels, representing 10-15% downside. Source: TradingView Recovery would depend on institutional buying at EMA support and an eventual positive resolution. ChatGPT‚Äôs XRP Analysis: Regulatory Convergence Creates Opportunity ChatGPT‚Äôs XRP analysis reveals unprecedented convergence of regulatory resolution, institutional ETF adoption, and technical consolidation strength. Next Price Target: $7.00-$10.00 Within 90 Days The immediate trajectory requires a decisive break above $3.02 resistance to validate continued institutional momentum over consolidation. From there, regulatory clarity acceleration could propel XRP toward $7.00 psychological milestone, with sustained ETF adoption driving toward $10.00+ representing new cycle highs. However, failure to break $3.02 would indicate extended consolidation to $2.70-$2.90 range as the regulatory timeline extends, creating an optimal accumulation opportunity before the next regulatory victory wave. title: USDC Minted: Unveiling the Crucial Impact of 250 Million on Crypto
body: BitcoinWorld USDC Minted: Unveiling the Crucial Impact of 250 Million on Crypto The cryptocurrency world often buzzes with activity, and a recent report from Whale Alert has certainly caught attention. A substantial 250 million USDC minted at the USDC Treasury has sparked discussions across the digital asset landscape. This significant stablecoin minting event by Circle, the issuer of USDC, holds important implications for the broader crypto ecosystem and its participants. What Does 250 Million USDC Minting Mean? When Whale Alert reports a large sum like 250 million USDC minted , it signals a direct action by Circle, the company behind the USD Coin. Minting, in this context, means creating new USDC tokens and adding them to the circulating supply. This process is typically driven by demand from institutional investors, exchanges, or large-scale users who wish to convert fiat currency into USDC for various purposes within the crypto space. It essentially means new U.S. dollars have entered the crypto economy via this stablecoin. Increased Liquidity: More USDC means more capital available for trading, lending, and other decentralized finance (DeFi) activities. Market Demand: Large mints often indicate a growing demand for stablecoins, suggesting capital inflow into the crypto market. Treasury Activity: The USDC Treasury acts as a central hub for these operations, ensuring transparency of the minting and burning process. Why is Circle USDC Minting Significant for the Market? The act of Circle USDC minting such a large amount, 250 million, is not a random occurrence. It typically reflects a direct response to market demand for a stable, dollar-pegged digital asset. This demand can come from various sources, including institutional players looking to onboard significant capital into the crypto ecosystem without direct exposure to volatile cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum. Furthermore, it influences the overall USDC supply , making more of the stablecoin available for use across different blockchain networks. Consider these key points: Institutional Inflow: Large mints can indicate that big money is entering the crypto space, seeking a stable entry point. DeFi Growth: USDC is a cornerstone of many DeFi protocols. Increased supply can support the growth of lending, borrowing, and yield farming platforms. Global Accessibility: USDC offers a fast and efficient way to transfer dollar-denominated value globally, bypassing traditional banking rails. Understanding the Broader Crypto Market Impact How does a large stablecoin minting event truly affect the crypto landscape? The infusion of 250 million USDC can have a ripple effect. For instance, increased USDC availability can lead to more active trading pairs on exchanges, potentially boosting liquidity for other cryptocurrencies. It can also signal a bullish sentiment, as new capital often seeks to deploy into other digital assets once it has entered the ecosystem via a stablecoin. This dynamic contributes to the overall crypto market impact , influencing trading volumes and investor confidence. This flow of funds helps to: Stabilize Trading: Provides a reliable base currency for traders to move in and out of volatile assets. Facilitate Payments: Enhances the utility of stablecoins for cross-border transactions and remittances. Boost Confidence: Demonstrates the ongoing utility and adoption of stablecoins within the financial system. What Does This Mean for the Future of USDC Supply? The consistent activity around USDC supply , including significant mints like 250 million, underscores the growing role of stablecoins in the digital economy. Circle‚Äôs transparency reports regarding its reserves back every USDC token 1:1 with U.S. dollar reserves or highly liquid assets, ensuring its stability. This transparency is crucial for maintaining trust and encouraging wider adoption. As the crypto space matures, the demand for reliable stablecoins like USDC will likely continue to grow, supporting various innovative applications from payments to decentralized finance. This ongoing minting activity suggests: Continued Growth: The stablecoin market is expanding, with USDC as a key player. Evolving Utility: USDC is finding new use cases beyond simple trading, including enterprise solutions. Regulatory Scrutiny: As stablecoins grow, so does the attention from regulators, which could shape their future. In conclusion, the recent 250 million USDC minted by Circle, reported by Whale Alert, is more than just a number; it is a clear indicator of sustained demand and growing utility for stablecoins within the dynamic cryptocurrency ecosystem. This event highlights the ongoing flow of capital into the digital asset space and reinforces USDC‚Äôs position as a crucial bridge between traditional finance and the innovative world of blockchain. As the market evolves, understanding these movements becomes vital for investors and enthusiasts alike. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is USDC? USDC (USD Coin) is a type of cryptocurrency known as a stablecoin. It is pegged 1:1 to the U.S. dollar, meaning one USDC is always intended to be worth one U.S. dollar. It is issued by Circle and backed by reserves of cash and short-duration U.S. government obligations. Why does Circle mint new USDC? Circle mints new USDC primarily in response to demand from individuals and institutions who want to convert U.S. dollars into a digital, blockchain-based equivalent. This often facilitates easier and faster transactions within the crypto ecosystem, especially for trading, lending, and payments. How does 250 million USDC minted affect the crypto market? A large amount of USDC minted , like 250 million, typically indicates an inflow of capital into the crypto market. It increases liquidity, making it easier for traders to move funds and potentially signaling a bullish sentiment as this stablecoin capital can then be deployed into other volatile assets. Is USDC a safe stablecoin? USDC is widely considered one of the most transparent and regulated stablecoins. Circle regularly publishes attestations of its reserves, showing that every USDC in circulation is fully backed. However, like all financial assets, it carries some inherent risks, though generally lower than unbacked cryptocurrencies. Who is Whale Alert? Whale Alert is a popular service that tracks and reports large cryptocurrency transactions on various blockchains. It provides real-time notifications about significant movements of digital assets, helping observers understand large capital flows in the crypto space. Did this article help you understand the significance of USDC minted events? Share your insights and help others grasp the dynamics of stablecoins by sharing this article on your social media channels! title: XRP News: Why Ripple Could Reach $5 In 2025 As Analysts Rank Desoc As The Best Crypto To Buy Now

Currently, Ripple Payments has more than 400 financial institutions connected, and the XRP coin is used in the backend to process live flows in more than 80 markets. Because each new payment corridor requires partners to purchase and then hold onto some XRP as pre-funded liquidity, the demand for tokens rises in tandem with transaction volume. It is unlikely that a central bank will later rip out XRP once it has been incorporated into its payment infrastructure, and additional pilot programs are most likely in the works. title: SEI Tanks 9% Weekly, but Analyst Predicts 1,300% Price Surge
body: TL;DR SEI trades near support as price drops 9% this week; volume stays above $200 million. Analyst compares SEI to SUI‚Äôs pre-rally setup, forecasting a sharp move toward $4 soon. Futures market heats up near $0.30 while Sei network TVL climbs to $604 million. SEI Declines After Pullback, Now Trading Below $0.29 Sei (SEI) is trading at around $0.29 after falling 3% over the past day and 9% over the past week. Daily trading volume came in close to $209 million, showing that traders remain active even as the token moves lower. SEI has seen steady selling pressure in recent sessions, moving away from the $0.30 level. Technical tools now place the token near its short-term support. Analysts are watching this area for signs of a possible reversal. Analyst Sees Bullish Setup Similar to SUI Crypto analyst Ali Martinez shared a comparison between SEI and SUI, pointing out a similar structure. According to the chart, SEI may be following the same path SUI did before its rally above $5. ‚ÄúThis could be the very last dip before a monster bull rally to $4,‚Äù Ali posted on X. Buy the dip! https://t.co/luEyY5nAHx ‚Äî Ali (@ali_charts) August 6, 2025 Interestingly, the current price of SEI sits below the 0.382 Fibonacci level, while the chart shows SUI had bounced from the 0.236 level in a similar setup. If SEI follows this structure, future levels of interest include $0.95, $1.38, $2.12, and $3.05. Price movement above these zones would require strong momentum and volume support. Sei is also seeing higher network activity. Data shared by Crypto Rand shows that SEI recently passed SUI in daily transactions. This shift in user activity points to steady growth across the Sei blockchain and may reflect stronger demand for its features at this stage. Indicators Show Mixed Signals Amid Consolidation On the 4-hour chart, Bollinger Bands show SEI moving inside a narrow range. The current price is near the middle band, which sits at $0.29. The bands are not widening or tightening, suggesting a lack of strong momentum in either direction. Source: TradingView In addition, the Relative Strength Index (RSI) is now at 46. This is slightly below the midpoint of 50 and signals weak momentum. It is not in oversold territory, but also not showing much buying strength. Futures Market Activity and Network Growth CryptoQuant‚Äôs bubble map shows growing volume in SEI futures. Recent data marks several overheating zones near the $0.30 level. While increased activity can lead to rallies, overheating can also trigger short-term corrections if volume comes from leveraged trades. Source: CryptoQuant Meanwhile, Sei recorded over $604 million in total value locked, up 7% in the past 24 hours, according to Defi Llama. The network has also integrated native USDC and Circle‚Äôs Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol V2 (CCTP), aiming to improve liquidity and transfer efficiency. title: Dogecoin Price Prediction: RSI Flashing Explosive Move Next ‚Äì Biggest Rally Coming?
body: The same technical setup that launched the first leg of the DOGE bull run is now repeating, but the Dogecoin price outlook could be even more bullish this time around. While uncertainty around tariffs has dulled enthusiasm for riskier plays like meme coins , a 7% bounce since the start of the month could signal a new DOGE uptrend. This move comes as the macro backdrop begins to shift in favor of risk assets. Speculators now expect up to three rate cuts before the end of the year, starting as soon as September. FED CAN NOW DO 3 RATE CUTS BY THE END OF 2025. MORE LIQUIDITY = ALTSEASON pic.twitter.com/0Q8uwjjkrb ‚Äî Max (@MaxCryptoxx) August 5, 2025 Lower borrowing costs could stimulate new inflows into risk assets like cryptocurrencies, reviving altcoin season sentiment. Could DOGE Be In for a Second, Larger Bull Run? The early August turnaround could signal the second leg of Dogecoin‚Äôs bull run, with the technical setup now echoing the first, according to popular X analyst Kriss Pax . DOGE/USDT 4-hour chart, RSI Breaches oversold threshold for the first time since June. Source: X, @Krisspax. Back in June, the 4-hour RSI dipped into oversold territory below 30, and what followed was a 70% rally that carried DOGE to its late July peak. That pattern now appears to be repeating. But this time, the move could be bigger. ‚ÄúLast time the price was $0.14 and now it‚Äôs around $0.20. Higher lows lead to higher highs,‚Äù Pax noted, suggesting stronger upside potential. A second leg up seems credible as smart money buys back into Dogecoin after profit taking saw whale holdings decline. Over the past 24 hours alone, whales have accumulated over 1 billion DOGE. Whales bought over one billion Dogecoin $DOGE in the last 24 hours! pic.twitter.com/qdGrIE6Gez ‚Äî Ali (@ali_charts) August 6, 2025 New conviction from large holders could be a testament to further gains to come, using the dip as an opportunity to reposition. DOGE / USDT 4-hour chart, falling wedge breakout. Source: TraidingView, Binance. Since Pax‚Äôs observation, the 4-hour RSI has bounced back from oversold territory to near neutral at 47, paving the way for a breakout of the wedge as buyers step back in. While the post-breakout momentum has stalled, the upper resistance of the pattern now holds as support. However, this footing could be weak as the MACD teeters on a potential death cross, moving tightly alongside the signal line. This opens the door to another retest of $0.19. A successful bounce from that level could form a double bottom, building a stronger base for reversal. For now, the uptrend shows staying power. If this momentum holds, Dogecoin could continue on the breakout path to $0.25 for a potential 24% gain from current prices. Should that level flip to support, the rally may extend toward the mid-July high at $0.2875 in a 38% gain, clearing a path for a continuation of the bull run. Much like the last time the RSI hit 30, it took a month for momentum to build. August could see continued consolidation as DOGE navigates the effects of new U.S. tariff duties on over 90 countries . Come September, a potential rate cut and the build-up to the spot DOGE ETF decision deadline in October could see renewed inflows. On the speculative scene, attention is what attracts fresh retail flows. Few see as much mind share as ‚Äúmission coins,‚Äù the purest form of meme coin, fueled purely by social momentum. We are at a pivot point. Dozens more launchpads will come. Millions of gamble coins will come and go. title: ETF Rumors Catapult Cronos (CRO) Price 76% ‚Äì Can Bulls Drive It Above $0.20 Next?
body: Cronos has gained attention in recent weeks as protocol upgrades and renewed liquidity flows bring it back into traders‚Äô discussions. The CRO price now sits around $0.1436 , according to CoinMarketCap, with a market cap of $4.65 billion and daily trading volume of about $35.6 million. Cronos Transaction Efficiency Improved in July In July, the network rolled out its POS Chain v6 upgrade, which introduced Cosmos SDK integration, RocksDB optimization, and IBC-go support. Cronos POS v6 is now live on mainnet! Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs under the hood: A faster engine: Cosmos SDK upgrade A safer network: Circuit Breaker deployed A lighter footprint: RocksDB tuned A builder-first upgrade for a builder-led future. pic.twitter.com/NvfF5GUNpp ‚Äî Cronos (@cronos_chain) July 28, 2025 These changes have been linked to improved transaction efficiency and higher DeFi participation. Following the update, total value locked on Cronos climbed to $710 million, up from $640 million the previous month. ETF speculation has also entered the picture. Crypto.com, in partnership with Canary Capital, submitted applications for a CRO-based exchange-traded fund. While approval is uncertain, the move has fueled discussion about potential institutional inflows. At the same time, transaction volume on decentralized exchanges running on Cronos reached $142 million in July, a sharp increase from June‚Äôs $76 million. Market Snapshot and Why It Matters CRO‚Äôs price has gained 76 percent over the past 30 days and more than 6.4 percent within the last 24 hours. Chart patterns, including a golden cross and a bullish pennant, may support further upside. Technical projections suggest a possible recovery toward $0.20 if buying pressure continues. Community activity has helped maintain momentum during the altcoin season . Staking on the network continues to attract participation, offering yields that appeal to long-term holders. On LunarCrush, CRO recorded thousands of social mentions in July, indicating strong retail engagement alongside protocol development. Despite recent strength, CRO is trading far below its all-time high of $0.9698 set in November 2021. While the current market structure is more cautious than in prior bull runs, the combination of rising TVL, ETF discussions, and technical support levels gives the token a clear base for continued interest. Cronos now sits in the middle ground. It is not part of the largest market-cap assets, but it has shown resilience and steady improvement through utility upgrades and community traction. Traders watching DeFi activity and ETF headlines may find CRO positioned for further movement as the second half of 2025 develops. The price section has been revised to reflect the latest market movement. The post ETF Rumors Catapult Cronos (CRO) Price 76% ‚Äì Can Bulls Drive It Above $0.20 Next? appeared first on Cryptonews .

Solana (SOL) historic price sentiment Solana Price History Source: Coinmarketcap Solana was launched in April 2020 and has gained popularity over the last 18 months. Its price surged from $0.75 to a high of $214.96 in early September. Following NFT hype and growing demand in the DeFi community, the cryptocurrency Solana (SOL) price more than tripled during the summer of 2021. Solana (SOL) token became the fastest-growing cryptocurrency and is currently ranked fifth¬†with a live market cap of nearly $66 billion. 2022 saw Solana leap to its all-time high of $260, but SOL failed to close the year anywhere near that high, as the price came crashing down to below $40 by June. The bearish markets were marked by high skepticism as trading volumes declined throughout the crypto markets. The price continued to trade below the $40 level until November 2023, when Solana gained momentum and started a bullish rally again to close the year at $101.84. In 2024, Solana (SOL) saw significant growth, with its price rising from $83.62 in January to a high of $202.87, fueled by its dominance in DeFi, NFTs, and decentralized exchanges. However, the price fluctuated through the year, retracing to $131 in September after struggling to maintain key levels. October brought a positive rebound as SOL rose from $152 to close at $167, but early November started bearish, with the price dipping to $160. However, Solana bounced back sharply and closed the month above the $230 mark. December, on the other hand, has observed a slow start as price volatility remains low. Solana‚Äôs (SOL) price rose significantly in January 2025 from below the $190 level to close the month above $210. However, the latter half of the month saw the price decline from the $230 mark, a trend that continued through February ending the month below $150. In March the price continued falling as the bears continued dominating the short to mid term markets ending the month below $125. In April the bearish rally has only continued as the price falls towards $100. However, the bulls bounced back in the middle of the month and ended the month around $150. In May the price continued to rise and ended the month above the $165 price level, a trend that could not extend through June as the month saw a decline falling below the $150 price level to end the month. July saw a sharp rise to the asset‚Äôs volatility with SOL crossing the $200 mark. However, the price could not be maintained and SOL ended the month below the $180 level.

title: Over $10 Million Raised In Weeks: Is DeSoc A Wiser Investment Than Litecoin & Monero
body: The crypto hall of fame has long held older coins like Monero (XMR) and Litecoin (LTC). Litecoin and Monero: Robust, But Outdated? Litecoin and Monero both offer battle-tested functionality. Litecoin, with an $8.4 Billion market cap, remains a popular ‚ÄúBitcoin-lite‚Äù alternative, faster and cheaper, to be sure, but nothing revolutionary. And Monero‚Äôs focus on private transactions keeps it viable in privacy-minded circles, with a $5.7 Billion market cap. Here‚Äôs the thing, though: neither project is evolving fast enough to remain relevant to the trajectory of Web3. Litecoin does not have any meaningful support for smart contracts or modern DeFi use cases. Monero, while private and secure, is increasingly out of touch with mainstream crypto integrations. That stands in comparison to DeSoc, a protocol constructed for the future of decentralized content, identity, and data sovereignty. What Makes DeSoc (SOCS) a Smarter Play? DeSoc isn‚Äôt just another altcoin. It‚Äôs a fundamentals project tackling one of the biggest pain points in Web3: fragmentation across social platforms. With its interoperable API, DeSoc enables developers, users, and platforms to sync data, posts, and identities across decentralized and centralized networks. The SOCS token powers that ecosystem, acting as the access, data transfer, staking, and participation token. Why SOCS Is Getting Attention: $10M+ raised in record time ‚Äì Massive early confidence from the crypto community Real utility ‚Äì Not a meme, but a project developed to solve multi-platform chaos Interoperability built in ‚Äì Bridges the gap between siloed Web3 and Web2 platforms Low gas fee crypto potential ‚Äì Optimized for efficiency at scale Touted as the next 100x crypto ‚Äì Undervalued with high upside It‚Äôs Not Just About Privacy Anymore Monero gained fame by offering fully private transactions, but today‚Äôs Web3 users demand more than privacy; they want control. Control of identity, data, content, and access. DeSoc delivers that by enabling wallet-based identity, zero-knowledge proof capability, and even soulbound credential support. These characteristics set it up for widespread adoption by developers, creators, and DAOs in addition to privacy maximalists. Meanwhile, the simplicity of Litecoin is becoming a liability. Since newer protocols offer greater utility and steeper adoption curves, it risks becoming lost in the shuffle without the backing of smart contracts or a distinct ecosystem. Why the Smart Money is Moving Into DeSoc Amidst a year of presales and hype, DeSoc stands out as it has already launched a product with demand. The $10 Million+ raised is being put towards infrastructure scaling, onboarding partners, and opening developer access. As more crypto holders seek real-world use cases, staking rewards, and tokens that are tied to platform adoption, SOCS offers a rare mix of fundamentals and forward readiness. It isn‚Äôt just a short-term hype train; it‚Äôs the kind of project that builds network effect as more social platforms integrate its framework. Final Take: Time to Rethink the Crypto Portfolio Litecoin and Monero still serve specific roles in crypto payments and privacy. But if you‚Äôre chasing growth, utility, and future relevance, DeSoc is the smarter investment in 2025 and beyond. Having raised over $10 million, developer adoption is growing, and a token tied to a real-world functional solution, SOCS, is possibly the silent giant that will overcome traditional coins by 2026.
